strings.description: A man who lived by hunting. Though Artemios wasn't from a hunting clan and started as a hobbyist, he knew no greater pleasure and eventually turned hunting into his trade. Dark rumors circulated that beasts weren't the only thing he hunted...
strings.summon:
This hunt is going to be fun.
What can I dispatch for you?
strings.affinity:
I owe you.
Thanks to you, I've been able to hunt to my heart's content.
strings.fusion:
Ah yes...
Nothing thrills the senses quite like the hunt.

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A man who dedicated his life to hunting. Artemios was a lowly peasant whose propensity for the hunt was such that he developed extraordinary skill, to the point that people wished to engage him as an assassin. Word has it that the change to human targets inspired no doubts in him, nor any special mercy for this new quarry.
strings.summon:
Where's my next target?
I'll take out anyone, or anything, you ask me to.
strings.evolution:
What happened? Am I stronger?
I want to go hunting right away...for something big!
strings.affinity:
I owe you.
Thanks to you, I've been able to hunt to my heart's content.
strings.fusion: A-hunting I shall go. Heh heh heh...

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A hardened hunter of beasts, monsters, and even humans. Thoroughly exploited as an agent of death, Artemios grew so savage that he began to attack people indiscriminately. The hunter became the hunted when his peers decided he was too dangerous to let live in his deranged state.
strings.summon:
Never mind why I'm back.
It's time to go hunting.
strings.evolution:
Heh heh heh...
I could get used to this feeling.
No quarry is safe from this hunter!
strings.affinity:
I owe you.
Thanks to you, I've been able to hunt to my heart's content.
strings.fusion:
Are you sure that is wise, hmmm...?
You may be my next target...

effects: Physical damage (2.7x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A samurai who valued loyalty and decorum, and wielded her blade only in service to her master. Chizuru and her fellow samurai, honorable warriors of great pride not unlike the knights of today, are occasionally referenced in historical chronicles, but specific details of the time period in which they lived and the lands from which they hailed are scarce.
strings.summon:
You must be my new master.
My body shall be your sword
and shield.
strings.affinity:
It is my honor to repay you
for all you have shared with me
in our journey together.
strings.fusion:
Master, I am grateful
for the power you
bestow upon me.

effects: Physical damage (2.6x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A katana-wielding samurai of great strength who served her master with undying loyalty by cultivating both body and spirit. After Chizuru retired from her duties, she married a ninja who served the same lord, and gave birth to both a son and a daughter. Sadly, due to strife within her clan, she lost her daughter to the shadows, filling her with grief until the end of her days.
strings.summon:
Master, I hope my skills with
the sword prove useful to you.
strings.evolution:
This power is a gift from my master.
I shall prove myself worthy
by devoting myself to my training.
strings.affinity:
It is my honor to repay you
for all you have shared with me
in our journey together.
strings.fusion:
You grant me still more power, master?
Then I shall devote myself
to you fully.

effects: Physical damage (2.8x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: Known as a samurai, she wields her blade out of loyalty for her master. She lived in accordance to the samurai code, and even after retiring she taught it to her children. However, after her daughter was taken in by the darkness, she left her family and master behind, instead deciding to take her own life by committing seppuku.
strings.summon:
Master...
Please, my blade,
use it as you will.
strings.evolution:
To thank you for this power
you have bestowed upon me.
I dedicate my life to you.
strings.affinity:
It is my honor to repay you
for all you have shared with me
in our journey together.
strings.fusion: I promise I will pay back the favor you did for me when you gave me power.

effects: Physical damage (3.1x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: The legitimate successor of a ninja clan who accepted orders from his master to carry out assassinations and infiltrations. Hayate took many pupils under his wing while working for the same master his family had loyally served for generations. After some time he apparently left in search of his younger sister, a ninja herself who had fled their home under mysterious circumstances. No records remain of what became of the two thereafter.
strings.summon:
I shall do my master's bidding,
no matter what is asked of me.
That is the way of the ninja.
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a long one, has it not?
This may be but a trifle,
but please accept it.
strings.fusion:
You grant me new power?
I shall repay this favor in kind.

effects: Fire physical damage (2.3x ATK) to one enemy.

화둔·강습 일식

strings.description: A legitimate heir of the arts of the ninja, and a peerless assassin and spy. Hayate's mother was a katana-wielding samurai of grave demeanor, a personality he inherited. The envy he harbored against his younger sister, an expert swordswoman adept with dual blades, gradually drove her toward the darkness, eventually causing her to flee their master's domain.
strings.summon:
Our encounter shows that you
are fated to be my new master.
From this day, I shall be your shadow.
strings.evolution:
The way of the ninja requires
constant devotion to one's training...
I live only for my master...
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a long one, has it not?
This may be but a trifle,
but please accept it.
strings.fusion:
Master. I shall not squander
the precious power
you bestow on me.

effects: Fire physical damage (2.5x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A ninja who committed political assassinations and gathered intelligence on foes in the name of his master. Born to a samurai mother, his younger sister was a ninja like himself. However, she was driven from their home by the coldness he showed her, and sought the power of darkness. To take responsibility for this turn of events, their mother honorably and tragically took her own life. Hayate gave his remaining years to his master, but now, as a vision, he wanders the world in search of his sister, in hopes that he might still make amends.
strings.summon:
That I have returned
to this world is a gift from my master.
I shall see the debt is paid.
strings.evolution:
I have been granted power anew.
I vow upon my blade
to serve my master with my life.
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a long one, has it not?
This may be but a trifle,
but please accept it.
strings.fusion:
Hmmm... You truly honor me.
If you would see me grow stronger,
your will shall be done.

effects: Fire physical damage (2.7x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A soldier for the Olderion Federation. Despite having average abilities, he has a competitive spirit and a stronger desire than most to protect others. He is engaged, put given his intense personality she is constantly worried he is pushing himself too far.
strings.summon:
What is this body?
Could it be those legendary...visions?
strings.affinity:
I was never really gifted.
Thank you for training
me as much as you did.
strings.fusion:
I can get stronger without working for it?
That's a bit...scary...

effects: Physical damage (4.6x ATK) to one enemy. Ignore cover.

strings.description: A soldier belonging to the Olderion Federation. Despite being of the Wardens of the Waters, he wasn't as intelligent or gifted with magic as his brother and sister were, so he instead trained his body, choosing the path of a soldier. Having once had an inferiority complex he didn't used to get along with his fellow soldiers, but now he has calmed down as a working soldier.
strings.summon:
This isn't my true body...
But if I can be of help
I will go with you.
strings.evolution:
I do feel stronger, indeed.
It's strange...but it should come in handy.
strings.affinity:
I was never really gifted.
Thank you for training
me as much as you did.
strings.fusion:
You're giving that to me, too...?
I am grateful for your support.

effects: Physical damage (5x ATK) to one enemy. Ignore cover.

strings.description: A soldier defending the Olderion Federation. Bearing a great sense of duty, he is proud of his place as a soldier. He was born into a noble family, coming from the line of the Wardens of the Waters, a group of people who protect others with special powers. His brother was a military tactician and his sister was a priestess, but he chose a different path. He decided he would use his own strength to contribute as much as he could.
strings.summon:
I am a soldier of Olderion.
If I can protect my family,
then I will go with you.
strings.evolution:
So, this is the power I had inside me?
It must be the blood of the guardians.
strings.affinity:
I was never really gifted.
Thank you for training
me as much as you did.
strings.fusion:
I will become even stronger.
Not just for my country, but also my family.

effects: Physical damage (5.4x ATK) to one enemy. Ignore cover.

strings.description: A water priestess charged with protecting the Olderion Federation. She has a deep bond with the water crystal, the incredible power of which she uses to cleanse the waters that protect the city from monsters. She also has two brothers, both of whom serve in protecting their country.
strings.summon:
Somehow, these memories...
I will do my best to be of use to you all.
strings.affinity:
To have been able to fight with
you until now...I'm so grateful.
I hope I can be of help to you.
strings.fusion:
Thank you very much.
I'll do my best to get stronger!

strings.description: A water priestess from the Olderion Federation. She has received the protection of the water crystal despite being so young, the power of which she uses to support the daily lives of her fellow citizens. Though kind and welcoming to all she comes across, she has dedicated her life to serving her people, and when the time comes she hides within her something that even her brothers couldn't match.
strings.summon: I can feel the protection of the water crystal. I will go along with you all.
strings.evolution:
I have...new power?
It must be a gift from the water crystals.
strings.affinity:
To have been able to fight with
you until now...I'm so grateful.
I hope I can be of help to you.
strings.fusion:
I'm so happy!
I can be even more useful to you all now!

strings.description: A citizen of the Olderion Federation, bestowed the position of water priestess. Her and all the members of her family are known as the "Wardens," people charged with protecting the water crystal, but as the water priestess she has the tremendous power of being able to wield the power of the water crystal, making her a pillar of Olderion society.
strings.summon:
The crystals have entrusted
you all with a great burden.
I also wish to help you.
strings.evolution:
I promise to be of use to you.
I dedicate myself to carrying out my will.
strings.affinity:
To have been able to fight with
you until now...I'm so grateful.
I hope I can be of help to you.

She's not just a pretty face, boasting powerful axe-wielding strength and unshaken charisma that separates her from the rest of the ruffians. All this points to a past which, given the comparatively peaceful state of Olderion, is surrounded in mystery as to how and why she became a pirate.

strings.description: A great hero sung of in tales from a distant world. One of the warriors of light whose coming was foretold in the prophecies of old. The four warriors of light arrived in the land of Cornelia, each bearing a crystal that had lost its light, and with no memories to speak of. In time, they realized that the crystals they held were inextricably linked to the four elements that sustained their world, and set off on a journey to instill them with light anew.
strings.summon:
Is it the crystals that guide me here?
No matter, my strength shall be yours!
strings.affinity:
For as long as you do not lose
sight of the light, I will stand
at your side. Onward!
strings.fusion:
Until the crystals shine bright
once more, I shall not
abandon my quest!

Arriving in the land of Cornelia, they saved Princess Sarah from the clutches of the rogue knight Garland, the first step in a journey which would see them restore light to the crystals. In listening to the tales of the people in the lands they explored, they gradually uncovered the true nature of the darkness that threatened the realm.

Yes, this shall be my new battlefield!

strings.description: A terrible creature who was once a knight from another world. He was the finest knight in all the kingdom of Cornelia, but when Princess Sarah rebuffed his love, he kidnapped her and barricaded himself in the Chaos Shrine. Four Warriors of Light, under command from the king, struck down Garland in his depravity and it seemed that his evil desires would be thwarted—but it was not to be. Escaping from death, Garland was drawn back through time to be reborn, two millennia in the past, as the immortal god known as Chaos.
strings.summon:
Ahahaha!
Do you remember me?

strings.fusion:

strings.description: A terrible creature who was once a knight from another world. He kidnapped the princess of his kingdom, Princess Sarah, and barricaded himself and the princess in the Chaos Shrine, until he was eventually struck down by the Warriors of Light. But instead of meeting death's final embrace, Garland was pulled back in time to be reborn, two thousand years in the past, as the being known as Chaos. To maintain his immortal existence, he sends the four fiends—one for each of the elements: wind, water, earth, and fire—into the future, to appear every two centuries to drain power from the Crystals and bring eternity within his grasp.
strings.summon:

strings.evolution:

From there he sends his four fiends into the future to steal power from the Crystals, fuelling his endless cycle of reincarnation. With each repetition of the cycle, the resentment he feels over the princess's rejection of his love grows within him.

Beloved throughout the realm for her beauty and kindness, she is kidnapped by the fallen knight Garland and imprisoned in the Chaos Shrine. In time, she is rescued by the Warriors of Light and returns to the castle, where she prays for the heroes' safety in their journey to restore the light of the crystals.

Her kidnapping and imprisonment at the hands of the fallen knight Garland devastates the kingdom, but she is rescued by the Warriors of Light. She entrusts to the heroes her magic lute, which grants them passage to their final confrontation with Chaos, and the end of their long journey.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. He lost his parents at a young age and was taken in by another family. He was like a true brother to their two children, Maria and Leon, and to Guy, another parentless child who came to live with them. When his homeland is destroyed by the Palamecian army, he is forced to flee. After leaving Fynn, he and his friends encounter Princess Hilda, the leader of the rebel army, and are saved by her. Without any home to return to, he, Maria, and Guy throw their lot in with the rebels.
strings.summon:
The Empire took everything from me.
Are you fighting to reclaim peace, too?
Then I'll gladly join you!
strings.fusion:
The wild rose...
It is how we recognize one another.
The very reason for our struggle.

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. His homeland, Fynn, is targeted by the Palamecian Empire, whose aim is to rule the entire world. Firion loses his home and joins the rebellion, along with his friends and fellow survivors, Maria and Guy. They throw themselves into the fight against the empire. Firion has a strong sense of justice and the wise judgment needed in a leader, yet also a certain weakness when it comes to women, which allows him to be tricked by the pirate Leila, and even once by a monster disguised as Princess Hilda.
strings.summon:
I won't bend to oppression.
I'll fight for my ideals to the end!
If you feel the same, let us go forth together!
strings.evolution:
I will summon every last bit of my strength...
That we may all live in peace again!
strings.fusion:
I've learned to be wary of women,
and anyone offering me a free ride.
Should I trust in this power?

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. To defeat the Palamecian Empire, which destroyed his homeland, he joins the rebel army led by Fynn's own Princess Hilda. His friend and adopted brother Leon also survived the fall of Fynn, but now stands against him as a key member of the Palamecian army. Firion loses many allies, including the White Wizard Minwu, and is toyed with continually by cruel fate, but never do his eyes stray from his goal: to put a stop to the Emperor of Palamecia.
strings.summon:
I won't let my friends' sacrifices be in vain!
I'll build a new future with my own hands!
strings.evolution:
I will take back what we've lost!
That is why we've come this far!
strings.affinity:
My friends give me strength.
Nothing would make me happier than to make you feel the same.
strings.fusion:
I will not stand down from this fight.
This is our battle...
You have to let us finish it!

effects: Physical damage (2.7x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young lady who appears in a tale of rebels and empires, in a far-flung world. Raised in Fynn with her elder brother Leon and fellow orphans Firion and Guy, she exudes a kindly confidence despite being lonely at heart. After losing her parents and being separated from her beloved brother after an attack by the Empire, she pledges herself to the rebellion alongside her friends.
strings.summon:
War frightens me. War took from me my home, my family...
I would fight with you to protect what you hold dear.
strings.fusion:
I'm going to do everything I can...
to end this war as quickly as possible!

strings.description: A young lady who appears in a tale of rebels and empires, in a far-flung world. Driven from her homeland after a strike by the Palamecian Empire, she joins the rebellion alongside her childhood friends Firion and Guy. She worries deeply for the fate of her lost brother, and is devastated when he reemerges before her as the evil emperor's Dark Knight. Though strong of spirit, she is profoundly affected by the death and suffering around her, and wishes nothing more than to regain the peace she once knew.
strings.summon: I don't want to lose any more of my friends. I don't want to see anyone else hurt. So I will go with you...to stop this war!
strings.evolution: I must put an end to this terrible conflict, that everyone may live together in peace once more!
strings.affinity:
We will need your strength if we hope to ever live in peace again.

strings.description: An elusive thief who appears in a tale of empires and rebels, told in a faraway world. His claim to be the best thief in the world is undisputed, provided you don't ask anyone else. No-one, though, can fault his moral fiber, as he steals only from the dastardly Empire. His infiltration of Castle Palamecia was an indubitable display of his talents, but his constant braggadocio has a tendency to wear on his companions.
strings.summon:
I'm Paul, greatest thief in all the world!

strings.fusion:

An honorable type who boasts that the Empire holds no ill-gotten treasure he cannot reappropriate, he won fame for infiltrating the nigh-impregnable Castle Palamecia. Sometimes saving, sometimes being saved by Firion and his fellow rebels, he provides them with valuable weapons and information after the liberation of his hometown of Fynn.
strings.summon: Leave the looting to Paul, the greatest thief the world has ever seen! Surely you've heard of me?

strings.affinity:

A very active boy with a strong sense of morality, he is definitely a leader type figure amongst the other children of the village. However, his recklessness can prove to be his weakness at times. On a fateful day, Luneth went to explore the Altar Cave and received a revelation from the Crystal enshrined within. Incredulous, yet willing, he then set off on a journey to save the world.

Disliking the strict smithing training her father forces upon her, she has run away from home numerous times. Having escaped the curse of the Djinn that struck her village by having run off to skip out on her training one day, she eventually joins Luneth and the others in order to save her foster father and the other villagers.

but I sure do like fighting alongside you!

Wow!

strings.description: A young girl hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. The adopted daughter of the mythril smith Takka, Refia never minces her words, but often shows a sort of motherly affection for those around her. Once she succeeded in breaking the Djinn's curse that afflicted her foster father and her village, she set off on a journey as one of the chosen Warriors of Light to save the world with Luneth and Arc from the neighboring village of Ur, and Castle Sasune's soldier Ingus.
strings.summon:
I am Refia.
Mind taking me along with you?
strings.evolution:
You can count on me more now, right?
I'm totally different from Luneth, you know!
strings.affinity:
I didn't like my blacksmith training,
but I sure do like fighting alongside you!
strings.fusion:
The Warrior of Light...
I wonder if I have it in me to protect the world.

strings.description: A young girl hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Having been raised by the mythril smith Takka, Refia grew up to be a straightforward young lady. However, she had her doubts about continuing the strict smithing training her father had encouraged her to pursue as a career, and eventually decided to join Luneth and the others on their quest as Warriors of Light. As the only girl in the party, her feminine side shows in how she dislikes becoming a toad to enter certain dungeons, or in the interest she displays for Ingus and Desch's love stories.
strings.summon:
Huh? Where am I?
Did the crystals call me?
strings.evolution:
I want to think about my own future.
That's why I want to know more about the world!
strings.affinity:
I didn't like my blacksmith training,
but I sure do like fighting alongside you!
strings.fusion:
The memories of people take shape...
The crystals of this world sure do have some strange powers.

strings.description: A young man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Ingus is an orphan who was raised as a loyal soldier of King Sasune's army. He is a levelheaded and honest young man who has won the trust of the King, and who has pledged his service to his country. Fortunately, he managed to escape the curse of the Djinn one day when he left the castle to train. Now he seeks his beloved, Princess Sara, who has gone missing, and hopes to free his people of the curse by heading to the Cave Altar with Luneth and the others.
strings.summon:
If there are crystals here too,
could that mean the Warriors of Light are here, as well?
strings.affinity:
I couldn't do anything on my own.
It's thanks to you that I've been able
to make it so far.
strings.fusion:
Sasune...
I wonder how Princess Sara is doing...

effects: Fire physical damage (2.1x MAG) to all enemies.

strings.description: A young man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Ingus is a dutiful and responsible soldier beloved by many, including the King. He loves Princess Sara, and she loves him in return, but he never acts upon it knowing that their relationship is an impossibility considering their origins. Having finally lifted the curse inflicted upon the castle by the Djinn, he set off on a journey with Luneth, Arc, and Refia to save the world.
strings.summon:
I am Ingus, warrior of Sasune.
I'm not very powerful, but I'll do whatever I can to help.
strings.evolution:
How's this?
I hope I'm at least a little bit stronger.
strings.affinity:
I couldn't do anything on my own.
It's thanks to you that I've been able
to make it so far.
strings.fusion:
To protect the world...
I guess in doing that I would be protecting Sasune, as well.

strings.description: A young man hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Ingus was chosen as a Warrior of Light when he helped to rid Castle Sasune of the curse it had suffered from the Djinn. He then set off on a journey with Luneth, Arc, and Refia to save his country, his people, and the world from the darkness consuming it. Always calm and composed, Ingus never fails to supports his comrades whenever they find themselves in a predicament.
strings.summon:
That smell... There's a battlefiled nearby.
This could be serious...
strings.evolution:
I can become even stronger.
Alright, just need to concentrate a bit harder.
strings.affinity:
I couldn't do anything on my own.
It's thanks to you that I've been able
to make it so far.
strings.fusion:
Regardless the situation,
as long as you keep your cool
there's nothing you can't overcome.

strings.description: A being of destruction, hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. It lives in the hope of returning all the world to nothingness, and is said to appear when the balance between light and dark is upset. When an ancient civilization, far advanced for their time, exhausted the power of the light, the Cloud of Darkness came forth from the great flood of light as it ran amok. It attempted to fulfill its goal of returning the world to nothingness, but the Warriors of Light and the Warriors of Dark, both chosen by the Crystals, defeated it and returned the world to stability.
strings.summon:
We are the Cloud of Darkness, keeper of the balance between the light and the dark.
You intrigue us.
strings.fusion:
Our power grows...and all for the better.
Now we will show you true destruction!

effects: Physical damage (2.1x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A being of destruction, hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. It appeared when an advanced civilization exhausted the power of the light, but then was sealed away by the Warriors of Light and the Warriors of Dark. But when the power-hungry wizard Xande calls on the power of darkness some one thousand years later in pursuit of eternal life and control over all the world, the Cloud of Darkness is woken once more. And in order to finally return both the World of Light and the World of Darkness to nothingness, it strikes down the Warriors of Light who would stand in its way.
strings.summon:
We are neither light nor darkness, but a limitless void.
Still, you would peer within?
strings.evolution:
This great flood of power...
We can feel the strength filling us...!
strings.fusion:
Hahaha!
Your hope...your despair...we will use it all
to power your destruction!

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A being of destruction, hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. It lives in the hope of returning all the world to nothingness, and is said to appear when the balance between light and dark is upset. When the wizard Xande floods the world with darkness, it awakens from its thousand-year-long sleep and strikes down the Warriors of Light who oppose it. But the Warriors of Dark sacrifice themselves to weaken it, giving the Warriors of Light one last chance to take on the Cloud of Darkness and defeat it once more.
strings.summon:
We are the keeper of balance.
You would seek the power of destruction, greedy mortal?
strings.evolution:
Complete destruction.
That is our true power.
As you shall soon witness...
strings.affinity:
We will return this world to the Void.
That is all we exist for.
And yet you would fight beside us?
strings.fusion:
The stronger the light, the darker the shadows grow.
That is the way of the world.

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A being of destruction, hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Once the balance of light and darkness was disrupted, the Cloud of Darkness emerged to return all the world to nothingness. Having awakened from its thousand-year-long sleep, it is believed to have also appeared when light had consumed the world long before, and again when the darkness brought upon by Master Xande ravaged the same. An emissary of the Void, the Cloud of Darkness cannot be defeated unless both light and darkness are used against it.
strings.summon:
There is none who can stop me.
The Void is unstoppable...
strings.evolution:
I tire of waiting.
I shall cover you all in both light and darkness!
strings.affinity:
We will return this world to the Void.
That is all we exist for.
And yet you would fight beside us?
strings.fusion:
The stronger I become,
the closer this world gets to the Void!

effects: Physical damage (2.7x ATK) to all enemies.
Inflict Blind (40%) on all enemies.

name: Perfect Void
完美虛無
완전한 무
Néant total
Absolute Leere
Vacío perfecto
desc: Dégâts et aveugle tous les ennemis
Daña e inflige ceguera a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. He is a Dark Knight, an elite warrior within the great military forces of the kingdom of Baron, and serves as captain of the Red Wings, Baron's airship fleet. He is a serious man, and suffers from grave doubts about the cruel actions his king demands in pursuit of the Crystals, and his own choice to wield the power of darkness. When he reveals these doubts to the king, he is stripped of his duty as captain of the Red Wings. Filled with despair, he sets out to Mist Valley to subjugate the Eidolons which live there—the last order he will ever take from his king.
strings.summon:
If you need help, I will offer my blade.
Such is the duty of a knight.
strings.fusion:
I will take the path I believe in.
Even if I must turn against my king.
I cannot lie to myself!

effects: Increase DEF and SPR by 20% for 3 turn(s) to all allies.

聖騎士榮耀
성기사의 긍지

strings.description: A knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. He served as a Dark Knight in the great military forces of the kingdom of Baron, but ultimately found himself unable to obey the cruel orders of his king, who sought the Crystals for himself. After turning his back on his kingdom, he sets out with a new group of allies—including his beloved Rosa, and Rydia, a girl he met in the village of Mist—to try to stop Golbez, his replacement in the Red Wings, from gaining the Crystals. Through this journey, he finally lets go of his doubts and is reborn as a sacred Paladin.
strings.summon: If you have something, someone you would protect...I would offer my aid. Let me journey with you.
strings.evolution:
I must atone for the wrongs I have committed.
For this reason and more, I must continue to grow stronger...
strings.fusion:
The dark sword...
Never again will I lift it!
I will not depend on those dark arts!

effects: Increase DEF and SPR by 30% for 3 turn(s) to all allies.

月光簾幕
달빛 장막
Voile lunaire
Mondlichtschleier
Velo luz de luna

strings.description: A knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. While journeying to protect the Crystals from the sorcerer Golbez, he experiences betrayal from his closest friend, the forging of new friendships, and the pain of final farewells. He grows stronger throughout these trials, even after the shock of learning his true identity as a descendant of the Lunarians and the brother of none other than Golbez himself. With the support of his allies, who have shared so many joys and pains with him, he commits himself fully to the battle for the future of the Blue Planet.
strings.summon: Were it not for my friends, I would have been lost long ago. Now it is my turn to help you.
strings.evolution:
I mustn't lose!
I cannot let down the people who have stood with me!
strings.affinity:
I would be honored to fight beside you.
On my honor as a paladin, I swear to aid you in this campaign!
strings.fusion:
I feel as though I have the
blessing of the moon itself...
Now is the time!

effects: Increase DEF and SPR by 40% for 3 turn(s) to all allies.

Gnade des Mondes

strings.description: A paladin who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. It was not until Cecil reached a turning point on Mount Ordeals that he finally laid to rest the doubts that had been clouding his mind. Upon reaching the summit, a mysterious voice calling him "my son" bade him cast off his past as a dark knight. Cecil vanquished his former self and was miraculously transformed into a paladin.
strings.summon:
As long as you follow a righteous path,
I shall serve as your shield!
strings.evolution: Justice and retribution are but trifling things. There are victories of greater worth. That mysterious, yet familiar voice spoke thus...
strings.affinity:
I would be honored to fight beside you.
On my honor as a paladin, I swear to aid you in this campaign!
strings.fusion:
I am not alone.
That must be the reason behind this surge of power.

effects: Increase ATK, DEF and SPR by 50% for 3 turn(s) to all allies.

strings.description: A dark knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Cecil came to regret his part in the mission to seize a Crystal from innocent people by order of the king. However, while yet mired in these uneasy contemplations, he was soon ordered to go on another mission, this time to deliver a special item to the summoner village of Mist. After Cecil and his good friend Kain arrived at Mist, they both watched the village burn to the ground courtesy of an incendiary bomb—the very item they had delivered.
strings.summon:
I am a dark knight.
The dark power I possess may not suffice to face true evil...
strings.affinity: If my powers as a dark knight can aid you in your endeavors, then allow me to continue fighting with you!
strings.fusion: I wish to use this power to aid others, even if my powers as a dark knight make them uneasy...

effects: Sacrifice 20% HP to deal dark physical damage (2.5x) to all enemies.

strings.description: A dark knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. At first forming doubts about the king of Baron's unjust deeds toward surrounding lands, then witnessing firsthand the destruction of the summoner village Mist by an incendiary bomb the king himself had ordered sent there, Cecil decided to defect from his country. He was also forced to part ways with his loyal friend Kain, who had accompanied him to Mist. However, Cecil did befriend a survivor of the village named Rydia, and together they set off to the oasis town of Kaipo.
strings.summon: I shall never forget the atrocities I have committed. I shall wear this burden along with my armor, and press forth.
strings.evolution: I have no intention of allowing the darkness to consume me. I shall not commit vile acts, no matter who gives the order!
strings.affinity: If my powers as a dark knight can aid you in your endeavors, then allow me to continue fighting with you!
strings.fusion: The day will come when I will have to stay true to my heart. I can feel it.

effects: Sacrifice 20% HP to deal dark physical damage (2.7x) to all enemies.

strings.description: A young man from a distant world where two moons rise in the sky. Leader of the dragoons, the elite regiment of Baron, he is both a loyal friend and strong rival to Cecil. While possessing a strong sense of justice, he is not at ease expressing his emotions to others. Disillusioned at the actions of their king, he and Cecil both defect from their homeland, but become separated. He reappears as Cecil's adversary, his true motivations unknown.
strings.summon:
Heh...
I'll show you the true strength of Baron's elite: the dragoons...
strings.fusion:
Rosa... Cecil...
What should I have done differently?

effects: Physical damage (2x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young man from a distant world where two moons rise in the sky, his pride and honor as one of the elite dragoons make it difficult for him to unguard his inner self. Despite his deep affection for Rosa, he concealed his feelings upon realizing it was Cecil she truly loved. His emotions manipulated by Golbez, he reappears before his friend—now as a formidable foe. After rediscovering his true self, he joins Cecil in his quest, seeking to atone for his sins.
strings.summon:
No-one can match my strength in the air.
The tip of my lance will pierce through evil!
strings.evolution:
I will not betray my friends again.
If I lose control of myself...
You must cut me down.
strings.affinity:
First Cecil and now you...
Why am I always surrounded by sentimental softies?
strings.fusion:
I am a dragoon.
I cannot bring disgrace to my rank.
Not...again.

effects: Physical damage (2.2x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young dragoon who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Kain had his emotions manipulated once again by Golbez, leading him to betray his friend Cecil and his companions a second time. Yet no one felt more humiliated by this than Kain himself. Having finally returned to his senses, he rejoined his friends to defeat Zemus, the true enemy: an evil presence who had been pulling Golbez's strings from the very beginning.
strings.summon: I never imagined someone would summon me to this world. If you are in need of my lance, I shall lend you my aid.
strings.evolution: One day I shall overcome my own weaknesses and doubts, and become a greater dragoon than my father!
strings.affinity:
First Cecil and now you...
Why am I always surrounded by sentimental softies?
strings.fusion:
You grant me...power?
I see we are all victims of curiosity. I shall repay this debt on the battlefield.

effects: Physical damage (2.7x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A white mage who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Rosa was an expert archer possessed of great beauty and grace, but who had eyes only for her childhood friend Cecil. When informed that Cecil had perished during a mission to vanquish a certain Eidolon, she refused to accept it and left Baron in search of him. Alas, she was stricken with desert fever and collapsed in the outskirts of Kaipo.
strings.summon:
Cecil... Please, Cecil... Be alive!
Oh, my apologies.
I believe I was having a nightmare.
strings.affinity:
I am happy you find me reliable!
I would like to continue using my magic to mend your wounds.
strings.fusion:
Please, I beg of you.
Help my prayers reach the heavens...

effects: Restore 55% HP and 15% MP to all allies.

name: Miracle of Baron
巴隆奇跡
바론의 기적
Miracle de Baron
Wunder von Baron
Milagro de Baronia
desc: Restore HP and MP for all allies
Rend des PV et PM à tous les alliés
Regeneriert LP und MP aller Verb.
Recupera la VIT y los PM de todos los aliados

strings.description: A white mage who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Rosa left the kingdom of Baron in search of Cecil, who had failed to return from an Eidolon-slaying mission. However, this resulted in her falling ill with desert fever, and eventually she collapsed. Once Cecil and his comrades managed to cure Rosa's illness using a sand pearl, the recovering Rosa begged to stay by Cecil's side and convinced him that they ought to travel together. No matter what peril they encountered, her restorative magic and skill with the bow allowed the party to press onward.
strings.summon:
I do not know how much aid I will be able to provide, but please...
Allow me to stay with you till the end!
strings.evolution: I will face any peril to be with my loved ones. I have made my choice!
strings.affinity:
I am happy you find me reliable!
I would like to continue using my magic to mend your wounds.
strings.fusion:
You have my thanks!
I shall not waste the power you've granted me. I will protect everyone!

effects: Restore 60% HP and 20% MP to all allies.

name: Miracle of Baron
巴隆奇跡

Miracle de Baron
Wunder von Baron

desc: Restore HP and MP for all allies
Rend des PV et PM à tous les alliés

strings.description: A young girl from a distant world with two moons. Born to a family of summoners in Mist, she lost her mother when the kingdom of Baron, fearing the power of the Eidolons, razed her home. Initially despising Cecil for his role in the attack, she gradually opens up to her new companion upon witnessing his kindness. Carrying the scars from the loss of her village, she matures as a summoner under the gentle care of Cecil and Rosa.
strings.summon:
I'm Rydia.
My magic will help you all. Just watch!
strings.fusion:
I may have lost my home,
but I still have Cecil and Rosa.
I still have friends!

effects: Fill Esper gauge by 1-4.

strings.description: A young summoner girl who hails from a distant world where two moons rise in the sky. Pure and true of heart, she suffers a tragedy when her home, the village of Mist, is burned to the ground by order of the king of Baron, who feared the power of the Eidolons. She joins Cecil and his companions on their journey, but is thought to be lost when swallowed by the great Leviathan. Later she returns from the Feymarch, home of the Eidolons, as a woman grown, lending her prodigious powers to her former companions as they face their greatest challenge.
strings.summon:
I learned a lot in the Feymarch!
My summoning powers are stronger than ever!
strings.evolution: Human or Eidolon, it's what's inside you that counts... Right, Cecil?
strings.affinity:
Even if we come from different worlds,
we can still learn to understand one
another. Just like this!
strings.fusion:
I don't want to lose anyone again...
That's why I have to become strong!
Stronger and stronger!

effects: Fill Esper gauge by 3-6.

strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Rydia is a summoner, and a survivor of the village of Mist. While journeying with Cecil and his companions, she was swallowed by the great Leviathan, only to later return from the Feymarch as a grown woman. Even as a full-fledged adult, Rydia retained her innocence and strength of spirit; her pure heart enabling her to befriend many Eidolons. She continued using their incredible power to help Cecil and his comrades on their quest, till the very end.
strings.summon: It is a strange sensation, being summoned. I wonder if the Eidolons I summon feel the same?
strings.evolution:
Mother, please watch over me.
I will become strong enough to protect my friends!
strings.affinity:
Even if we come from different worlds,
we can still learn to understand one
another. Just like this!
strings.fusion: I can feel my connection to the Eidolons growing stronger than ever.

effects: Fill Esper gauge by 5-8.

strings.description: A wizened old mage whose story is told in tales of a distant blue planet where two moons rise in the sky. Known as the Great Sage of Mysidia for his prodigious arcane knowledge, he tragically brought great destruction to his homeland when his pursuit of forbidden learning released magical energies that ran amok, causing terrible casualties among his fellow mages. To atone for his crimes, he exiled himself from Mysidia, taking up residence in the far-flung desert town of Kaipo.
strings.summon:
Once they called me the Great Sage of Mysidia.
I might be old, but I still
have a few tricks up my sleeve!
strings.affinity:
For as long as you do not lose
sight of the light, I will stand
at your side. Onward!
strings.fusion:
Anna...
I pray you'll forgive this foolish
old man...

effects: Magical damage (2.1x MAG) to all enemies.

strings.description: A wizened old mage whose story is told in tales of a distant blue planet where two moons rise in the sky. Once revered as the Great Sage of Mysidia for his knowledge of ancient and forbidden magicks, in his advanced years his addled brain remembers few of the incantations that once made him a force to be reckoned with. Leaving behind his homeland of Mysidia after a tragedy, he lived a quiet life in the desert town of Kaipo. When his dear daughter Anna eloped with a wandering minstrel, the old man could take no more, and made for Damcyan to deliver a stern telling-off to the spoony bard who stole his daughter away.
strings.summon:
The forbidden magic, meteor.
Does it lie hidden in this world?
strings.evolution:
Could it be? How strange!
It's starting to come back to me...
strings.affinity:
Hah! There's nothing like the sight of brave
youngsters to breathe life back into an old man!
strings.fusion:
I will get revenge for my Anna,
even if it means my own demise!

effects: Magical damage (2.3x MAG) to all enemies.

strings.description: A wizened old mage whose story is told in tales of a distant blue planet where two moons rise in the sky. Searching for his daughter Anna, who had fled their town with the bard she loved, he met Cecil and his companions. He arrived in Damcyan only to witness his beloved daughter giving her life to protect her lover from an attack from Golbez's army. After unleashing his anger and sadness on the spoony bard whom he deemed responsible for his daughter's death, he then channeled that fury into a quest for revenge against the true villain, Golbez.
strings.summon:
Seems a tough road lies ahead.
But no matter!
My magic will show the way!
strings.evolution:
These powers...
It would seem this old man's
only begun to fight!
strings.affinity:
Hah! There's nothing like the sight of brave
youngsters to breathe life back into an old man!
strings.fusion:
What's this?
Is this the knowledge and strength
of my youth...or something greater?

effects: Magical damage (2.5x MAG) to all enemies.

strings.description: A man who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Edge was the prince of Eblan, a nation rich in the ancient tradition of ninja; an art that Edge himself used in battle. He was rude, hotheaded, and stubborn, and his subordinates often bore the brunt of his rashness. However, his straightforward personality and strong will were admired by many, who adoringly called him "Young Highness."
strings.summon:
I am Edge, prince of Eblan!
I will teach you the ways of the ninja!
strings.affinity: People could grow stronger if they chose to fight together. I truly believe that!
strings.fusion:
Well, this feels rather strange.
Did it make me stronger?

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to one enemy.
Inflict one random status effect (20%).

艾布拉納奧義
에브라나의 오의
Technique secrète d'Éblana
Eblans Technik
Técnica de Eblan

攻擊1名敵人+隨機異常狀態
Dégâts et une altération d'état au hasard sur un ennemi
Schaden und zuf. Zustand, ein Ziel

strings.description: The prince of Eblan, who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Edge had mastered the ninja techniques inherited from his ancestors. His home was destroyed by Rubicante, one of Golbez's Archfiends, and thus he sought vengeance by following him, alone, to the Tower of Babil. There he met Cecil, whom at first he refused to join, as he was still obsessed with revenge. However, the obstinacy he showed in the beginning began to wane as he traveled with Cecil, gradually giving way to a more mature and sensitive personality.
strings.summon:
My apologies for the wait!
I will punish all evildoers who cross our path!
strings.evolution: Father, Mother...please watch over me. I will become much stronger, you'll see!
strings.affinity: People could grow stronger if they chose to fight together. I truly believe that!
strings.fusion: Have I become even lighter on my feet? Very well, now leave the rest to me!

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to one enemy.
Inflict 2 random status effects (30%).

艾布拉納奧義
에브라나의 오의

Schaden und zuf. Zustand, ein Ziel
Daña y causa un estado alterado al azar a una enemigo

strings.description: The prince of Eblan, who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Edge's home was destroyed by Rubicante, one of Golbez's Archfiends, which prompted him to infiltrate the enemy's stronghold, seeking revenge for the fate of his lost countrymen. Once inside the Tower of Babil, he underwent many terrible trials, including doing battle against his own grotesquely transformed parents. However, he successfully defeated Rubicante, and later continued helping Cecil and his other comrades in their quest to stop Golbez from realizing his ambitions.
strings.summon:
Excuse me, have you seen a beautiful green-haired girl around here?
Her name is Rydia.
Do you happen to know her?
strings.evolution:
I cannot lie to my own heart!
I will embrace my anger and hatred...and they'll rocket me to the top!
strings.affinity: People could grow stronger if they chose to fight together. I truly believe that!
strings.fusion: I will use this power to protect my country, my comrades, and her!

effects: Physical damage (2.7x ATK) to one enemy.
Inflict 3 random status effects (40%).

name: Eblan's Technique
艾布拉納奧義
에브라나의 오의
Technique secrète d'Éblana
Eblans Technik
Técnica de Eblan

Schaden und zuf. Zustand, ein Ziel
Daña y causa un estado alterado al azar a una enemigo

strings.description: King of the Dwarves in a faraway world where two moons rise in the sky. Ruler of the Underworld, his castle is home to a crystal, guarded by a mighty army. Particularly proud of his battalion of tanks, said to be a match for even the mighty airships of the Red Wings of Baron, he fights bravely with Cecil and his comrades to protect the crystal. After the passing of his wife, the Queen, he dotes on his daughter Luca with the love of two parents.
strings.summon:
I am Giott, king of the dwarves!
Let us fight for this land that gave us life!
strings.fusion:
Fear not!
Even if we no longer have tanks,
I still have my hammer!

effects: Physical damage (1.6x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: King of the Dwarves in a faraway world where two moons rise in the sky, he rules the Underworld with a steady hand and dotes endlessly on his daughter Luca. He leads his prized tank battalion in an endeavor to protect the Crystal from Golbez and the Red Wings, but the battle proves a trying one. United with Cecil and his friends by a common goal, he spares no effort in lending the heroes his aid.
strings.summon:
Leave the battle to me!
We dwarves have only begun to fight!
strings.evolution:
Our beloved homeland gives us strength.
Behold the power of the dwarves!
strings.affinity:
With dwarven technology and your power...
We'll be as strong as a hundred men!
strings.fusion:
Mark me!
While I yet stand,
those villains shall not do as they please!

effects: Physical damage (1.8x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A mage from a different world who tried to destroy a certain blue planet with two moons. He controls the armies of Baron from the shadows in order to seize the Crystals that lie in each land, and drives Baron to commit terrible atrocities. Beneath him serve the four Archfiends: Scarmiglione of earth, Cagnazzo of water, Barbariccia of wind, and Rubicante of fire. But his own power is also great, and he uses many cruel tactics in his various confrontations with Cecil, including controlling Cecil's best friend, Kain, with the darkness that lay hidden in the dragoon's heart.
strings.summon:
Just how much power do you possess?
I have no business with insects.
Show me your true strength!
strings.affinity:
I was once consumed by evil myself.
There is nothing I can say now to defend myself.
Let me repay my debts in sweat and blood.
strings.fusion:
This power is reminiscent of the crystals...
I can feel my strength growing.

effects: Dark magical damage (2.1x MAG) to all enemies.

name: Onyx Dragon
黑龍，參戰！
나와라, 흑룡이여!
Dragon d'onyx
Schattendrache
Dragón de ónice
desc: 對全體敵人發動暗屬性攻擊
Dégâts de ténèbres sur tous les ennemis
Daño oscuro a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A mage from a different world who tried to destroy a certain blue planet with two moons. This mysterious man, concealed in black armor, stands opposed to Cecil and his allies in their battle over the Crystals' fate. He commands the Archfiends, and uses underhanded methods to try to throw Cecil, and the world, into confusion, including controlling Kain and having him kidnap Cecil's beloved Rosa. In truth, he is a son of the Lunarian Kluya—as well as Cecil's elder brother. Twisted by the dark will of Zemus, who is behind all of the troubles befalling the Blue Planet, he does whatever he must to fulfill Zemus's cruel wishes.
strings.summon:
You think that you can control my power?
Well, I suppose we shall see...won't we?
strings.evolution:
I cannot...perish!
No matter what happens to me...I will see my ambition realized!
strings.affinity:
I was once consumed by evil myself.
There is nothing I can say now to defend myself.
Let me repay my debts in sweat and blood.
strings.fusion:
I will not allow you to look down on me.
Do not think me so weak.
I will show you my true strength yet.

effects: Dark magical damage (2.3x MAG) to all enemies.

name: Twin Moons
雙月
쌍둥이 달
Lunes jumelles
Doppelmond
Lunas gemelas
desc: 對全體敵人發動暗屬性攻擊
Dégâts de ténèbres sur tous les ennemis
Daño oscuro a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A mage from a different world who tried to destroy a certain blue planet with two moons. He is in fact Cecil's elder brother, and was being controlled by an evil Lunarian named Zemus, who directed him to destroy the Crystals. After a long struggle, Golbez finally regained control of his mind and chose to join his brother in the fight against Zemus. With the aid of their uncle, Fusoya, he defeats their enemy—only to be faced with Zeromus, an even fouler monster birthed from Zemus's remains. Struck down by Zeromus's darkness, Golbez must entrust the final battle to his brother, Cecil.
strings.summon:
You seek my power?
So be it! Use it as you will!
strings.evolution:
What came over me?
Why was I filled with...so much hatred?
strings.affinity:
I was once consumed by evil myself.
There is nothing I can say now to defend myself.
Let me repay my debts in sweat and blood.
strings.fusion:
Moon above, grant me power.
The true strength I need to gain victory
over evil and hatred!

effects: Dark magical damage (2.5x MAG) to all enemies.

name: Dark of the Moon
新月之暗
초승달의 어둠
Ombre de la lune
Neumondnacht
Oscuridad lunar
desc: 對全體敵人發動暗屬性攻擊
Dégâts de ténèbres sur tous les ennemis
Daño oscuro a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he hailed from the village of Lix and was involved in the war of the Crystals. His father's last wish was for Bartz to travel the world, and thus he roams, from one land to the next with his chocobo, Boko. In the course of this wandering, he sees a meteorite fall from the sky and strike Tycoon. Following its path, he meets the princess Lenna, and Galuf, an old man who has lost his memories. This is how his true adventure begins. Using the skills that his father, Dorgann, passed on to him, he defeats many strong foes...though he cannot defeat his childhood fear of heights so easily.
strings.summon:
The wind is calling me...
Let's go see this wide world together!
strings.fusion:
Thanks!
With this kind of power,
I'll be able to fight on.

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he hailed from the village of Lix and was involved in the war of the Crystals. He is passionate, and a powerful ally who does not hesitate to help his comrades. He travels with his friends to protect the Crystals of wind, water, fire, and earth. Yet the Crystals are destroyed, one by one, by outside forces. Still, as each Crystal shatters, Bartz and his allies gain new skills to help them in their noble cause.
strings.summon:
I feel the power of the Crystals here, too.
Please, let me fight with you!
strings.evolution:
I can feel the strength...and the spirit of the Crystal...
Such incredible power!
strings.fusion:
The world is so vast...
I've got to be stronger if
I'm going to see it all.
Will you lend me your strength?

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he was involved in the war of the Crystals. During his journeys to protect the Crystals, he learns of the existence of Exdeath, an ancient warlock seeking to lead the world to destruction. More astoundingly, he learns that his late father was one of the four Warriors of Dawn who had previously sealed away Exdeath and saved the world. Following in his father's footsteps, he sets out to unseal the Legendary Weapons and defeat Exdeath within the Interdimensional Rift.
strings.summon:
You're you, and that's all that matters to me!
I'll lend you my strength!
strings.evolution:
Now I know how Dad must have felt.
Dorgann the Dawn Warrior's legacy continues with me!
strings.affinity:
Let's go. We'll keep everyone safe.
We'll protect our world, and our crystals!
strings.fusion:
I've got to become stronger!
I owe it to those I've lost!

effects: Physical damage (2.7x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he was involved in the war of the Crystals. Following in the footsteps of his father Dorgann and Galuf, Bartz set off on a journey to rid the world of the ancient warlock Exdeath, who seeks to rule the world with the power of the Void. He had always been a positive influence in the party, always adamant in his quest to save the world. However, he lost all composure when his hometown of Lix was swallowed by the Void at the hands of Exdeath. His rage ended up destroying the airship he and his companions had boarded.
strings.summon:
Never lose your sense of adventure.
Look forward to workin' with ya!
strings.evolution:
Ah, the winds of change!
Check out what I can do now!
strings.affinity:
Let's go. We'll keep everyone safe.
We'll protect your world, and your crystals!
strings.fusion:
I'll grow even stronger using the
techniques I learned from my father!

effects: Physical damage (3.1x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A princess sung of in a tale of crystals from a far-flung world. The kind-hearted daughter of King Tycoon, she fears for her father's safety when he fails to return from a mission to investigate the Wind Crystal, and sets out for the Shrine of Wind alone. On her way, she loses consciousness after a meteor crash, and is nearly kidnapped by a band of goblins before being saved by a young adventurer named Bartz. Together with an old man, Galuf, who has lost his memories, the three companions head for the Wind Shrine.
strings.summon:
I'm Lenna, daughter of King Tycoon.
You fight to save the crystals?
Then I will go with you!
strings.affinity:
Through all the pain and sadness,
my companions were always by my side.
This time, I stand with you.
strings.fusion:
It's so warm...
Like touching the heart of a crystal...

effects: Restore 400 (+1.2x SPR) HP to all allies.
Increase MAG by 10% for 3 turn(s) to all allies.

name: Heart of Devotion
慰勞之心
연민의 정
Esprit de dévotion
Herz der Aufopferung
Corazón devoto
desc: Restore HP and boost MAG for all allies
恢復全體隊員的HP+提高魔力的數值
Soigne et augmente la MAGIE de tous les alliés.
Regeneriert LP & erhöht MAG aller Verbündeten
Recupera VIT y aumenta la MAG de todos los aliados

strings.description: A princess sung of in a tale of crystals from a far-flung world. The daughter of King Tycoon, she meets Bartz and Galuf on her way to the Wind Shrine in search of her father, and is later reunited with Faris, her sister from whom she was separated at birth. Together, the new companions set off on a journey to save the crystals. Kind of heart and fair to all living creatures, she holds a particular fondness for Hiryu, a wind drake who has lived with the Tycoon royal family since her childhood.
strings.summon:
This world is in danger, is it not?
Then bring me with you.
I'm sure I can help!
strings.evolution:
This strength...!
I will use it to save this world,
and those I love!
strings.affinity:
Through all the pain and sadness,
my companions were always by my side.
This time, I stand with you.
strings.fusion:
Are there wind drakes in this
world as well? They are such
gentle and intelligent creatures...

effects: Restore 600 (+1.4x SPR) HP to all allies.
Increase MAG by 20% for 3 turn(s) to all allies.

name: Tycoon Guard
泰空的守護
타이쿤의 수호
Garde de Tycoon
Tycoon-Schutz
Guardia de Tycoon
desc: Restore HP and boost MAG for all allies
恢復全體隊員的HP+提高魔力的數值
Soigne et augmente la MAGIE de tous les alliés.
Regeneriert LP & erhöht MAG aller Verbündeten
Recupera VIT y aumenta la MAG de todos los aliados

strings.description: A princess sung of in a tale of crystals from a far-flung world. The daughter of King Tycoon, in her journey to protect the crystals, she comes to learn the truth of her shattered world and the threat of the warlock Exdeath, who seeks to destroy the world's crystals in his plot to attain the power of the Void. Overcoming the pain and sadness of being forced to part with her father, her wind drake Hiryu, and Galuf, she fights bravely to the end alongside her companions in their quest to save the world.
strings.summon:
Could this be the Interdimensional Rift?
No, I see...
This is your world.
strings.evolution:
My father entrusted this world to me.
I must press onward!
strings.affinity:
Through all the pain and sadness,
my companions were always by my side.
This time, I stand with you.
strings.fusion:
Hope, courage, devotion, passion...
The four essences will bring light
to the crystals once more!

effects: Restore 800 (+1.6x SPR) HP to all allies.
Increase MAG by 30% for 3 turn(s) to all allies.

name: Benediction
慈愛祈禱
자애의 기도
Onction
Weihung
Consagración
desc: Restore HP and boost MAG for all allies
恢復全體隊員的HP+提高魔力的數值
Soigne et augmente la MAGIE de tous les alliés.
Regeneriert LP & erhöht MAG aller Verbündeten
Recupera VIT y aumenta la MAG de todos los aliados

strings.description: An old warrior from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. He first met Bartz and his allies in the aftermath of a meteorite strike. At that time, he had no memory of his identity, save his own name and his duty to protect the Crystals. As he journeys with the others, though, he recalls more and more of his past life. He remembers that he comes from a different world than the one Bartz and the others live in. And there, he had been one of the four Warriors of Dawn, who sealed the warlock Exdeath in the past after a desperate struggle.
strings.summon:
I am not from this world!
...Wait, why do I feel like I've said this before?
strings.evolution:
I remember!
I was one of the Dawn Warriors!
I finally remember everything!
strings.affinity:
When I look at you young people, it brings me back to my younger days.
How long it has been...
strings.fusion:
What a warm feeling...
It reminds me of the crystals' power.

effects: Physical damage (2x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: An old warrior from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. He was the king of Bal in the Second World, and one of the Warriors of Dawn who formerly sealed away Exdeath. Unable to defeat Exdeath in a contest of strength, the Warriors had little choice but to seal him in the First World. Galuf has been haunted ever since by the fear that he left another world infected with the seeds of destruction. His love for peace and for his comrades is beyond compare, and inspires him to take on Exdeath in one-on-one combat, in order to save Bartz and the other Warriors of Light in the Great Forest of Moore.
strings.summon:
I am Galuf, King of Bal!
My hair may be gray, but I'm a Warrior of Dawn all the same!
strings.evolution:
I won't lose to you younglings yet!
I'll show you how real warriors were made in the old days!
strings.affinity:
When I look at you young people, it brings me back to my younger days.
How long it has been...
strings.fusion:
I've got to pick up the pace a bit or
Krile will scold me again!
I won't let you young'uns leave me behind!

effects: Physical damage (2.2x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: An old warrior from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. Galuf was one of the four original Warriors of Dawn who first sealed the warlock Exdeath. However, the seal eventually broke freeing Exdeath in the process, which lead Galuf to seek the help of Bartz and his friends in another world. Determined to protect his comrades and family, he lost his life facing Exdeath in battle. His will now lives on in his granddaughter Krile, whom he continues supporting in spirit.
strings.summon:
Above being the King of Bal,
I am your ally!
Feel free to call me Galuf.
strings.evolution:
The attitude of a ruler, I have not.
As a Warrior of Dawn,
I shall fight alongside you!
strings.affinity:
When I look at you young people, it brings me back to my younger days.
How long it has been...
strings.fusion:
All is fine.
I'll join ya!
These beasts are nothing to me.

effects: Physical damage (2.7x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A pirate captain from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. Although seemingly a rugged ruffian from the seas, Faris only began dressing as a man so that others would take her seriously. She sought to kidnap Lenna, the princess of Tycoon, for ransom when she came stumbling into her ship one day. However, she became curious about their possible connection after having noticed that they both wore the same pendant, and decides to help her and her party to reach the Wind Shrine.
strings.summon:
This might be a long journey.
I wonder how everyone's doing back at the Pirates' Hideout.
strings.affinity:
Don't you even think
about leaving me behind.
I want to stick with you a little more.
strings.fusion: I was abducted when I was small and raised by pirates. Don't you dare make fun of me for being a girl!

effects: Air physical damage (2.1x ATK) to all enemies.
Inflict Paralyze (20%) on all enemies.

name: Thunderstorm
雷電風暴
선더 스톰
Orage
Donnersturm
Tormenta eléctrica
desc: Wind damage and paralyze all enemies
對全體敵人發動風屬性攻擊+麻痺
Dégâts de vent et paralyse tous les ennemis
Daño de viento y paraliza a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A pirate captain from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. Although Faris initially seeks to have Bartz and company ransomed, she helps them to reach the Wind Shrine and is eventually tasked with protecting the Crystals along with the others. She also discovers that Lenna, the princess of Tycoon who happens to wear the same pendant she does, is in fact her younger sister. Unfortunately, the reunion both sisters would share with their father, the king of Tycoon, after this discovery would be short-lived.
strings.summon:
Were you think of stealing my ship?
What a daring one, you are!
strings.evolution:
I, a pirate, am actually a princess...?
Enough with the jokes!
strings.affinity:
Don't you even think
about leaving me behind.
I want to stick with you a little more.
strings.fusion:
I can't afford to look like a slob
in front of my henchmen.

effects: Air physical damage (2.3x ATK) to all enemies.
Inflict Paralyze (30%) on all enemies.

name: Thunderstorm
雷電風暴
선더 스톰
Orage
Donnersturm
Tormenta eléctrica
desc: Wind damage and paralyze all enemies
對全體敵人發動風屬性攻擊+麻痺
Dégâts de vent et paralyse tous les ennemis
Daño de viento y paraliza a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A princess hailing from the kingdom of Tycoon in another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. Faris was lost at sea when the ship she was boarding crashed, and was henceforth raised by pirates. She would then eventually join her estranged sister Lenna and Bartz's party to put a stop to the legendary warlock, Exdeath. In the perilous battles to come Syldra, the sea dragon Faris had befriended in her youth, allowed itself to be summoned in order to grant her the use of its powers.
strings.summon:
I don't want to see anyone die.
That is why I lend you my power.
strings.evolution: See? I'm nothing like a princess, after all!
strings.affinity:
Don't you even think
about leaving me behind.
I want to stick with you a little more.
strings.fusion:

strings.description: A young girl whose story is told in a tale of crystals, from another world. Princess of Bal in the Second World, she is the granddaughter of Galuf, who lovingly raised her after the disappearance of her parents. Fearing for her grandfather after he set off to protect the crystal, she rides a meteorite and travels to Bartz's world on her own, a brave act which awakens Galuf's long-lost memories.
strings.summon:
Hi! I'm Krile!
I want to fight with you, too!
strings.fusion:
If there are any creatures you want to
talk to, I'd be happy to interpret for you!

strings.description: A young girl whose story is told in a tale of crystals, from another world. Princess of Bal in the Second World and granddaughter to Galuf, she loses her last remaining blood relative when her grandfather falls in battle to Exdeath. Though grieving his loss, she seems to inherit his power and his purpose, joining Bartz and his friends on their quest. With her curious ability to converse with wind drakes, moogles and other creatures, she proves an invaluable ally to her companions.
strings.summon:
A voice called me here...at least I think it did.
Maybe I can help you?
strings.evolution:
Grandpa, give me strength...
I want to protect the Crystals, too!
strings.affinity:
You can count on me for anything!
I'll do my best to help out!
strings.fusion:
Hey, I'm grandpa's little girl!
I'm as good at fighting as anyone!

She joined Bartz and his companions after her grandfather fell in battle at the hands of Exdeath. Having the ability to understand animals and the sort, she is said to have helped facilitate communication between Bartz and his partner Boko, Lenna and her family's wind drakes, and Faris and her sea dragon Syldra.
strings.summon:
I'm not lonely or anything.
Isn't that right, grandfather?
strings.evolution:
I'll do my best!
If I don't, my grandfather would laugh at me.
strings.affinity:

I'll do my best to help out!

How warm...

strings.description: A warlock who hails from a world where the Crystals shine with light. It is said that he was born, some five centuries before the tale begins, when all the malevolent souls trapped within the Great Forest of Moore took root in a single tree. He was defeated once by the Warriors of Dawn, and sealed away in the world also occupied by Bartz and his allies. But he was able to destroy the Crystals, which were weakened from overuse, and return to his former strength. His ultimate goal is to return the two split worlds to one, and seize the power of the Void, which lies in the Interdimensional Rift.
strings.summon:
I have been reborn!
Mwahahaha!
And now I shall remake the world in my image!
strings.fusion:
Evil will take on a life of its own,
in whatever host it can find.
Yes, even in a solitary tree...

strings.description: A warlock who hails from a world where the Crystals shine with light. It is said that he was born when countless malevolent souls gathered and took root in a single tree. He craves the power of the Void in the Interdimensional Rift. To obtain it, he will destroy the Crystals in every land and return the two worlds, divided a thousand years earlier, to one. After he achieves this sinister goal, towns and villages begin disappearing at a horrifying rate. But in the end, even Exdeath himself is consumed by the massive power of the Void.
strings.summon: All who oppose me will be consumed by my power! Take care not to get in the way...
strings.evolution:
Power wells within me...!
I cannot be defeated by anger or hatred!
strings.fusion:
Mwahahaha!
What invigorating power!
With this, I have no need of the Void!

strings.description: A warlock who hails from a world where the Crystals shine with light and who claimed for himself the power of the Void. He is a creature born from countless malevolent souls, which gathered and took root in a single tree. By bringing together two previously-separated worlds, he seized the power of the Void. With it, he began wiping towns and villages from the map. But in the end, even Exdeath himself is consumed by the Void's massive power, losing himself and becoming Neo Exdeath. As Neo Exdeath, he desires the utter destruction of everything: all memory, all life, all worlds, and even himself. He is struck down by Bartz and his allies.
strings.summon:
I seek the power of the Void.
I will obliterate any who stand in my way!
strings.evolution:

With this new strength of mine, perhaps I could even defeat...you!
strings.affinity:
The world shall inevitably be mine.
Until that day, I do not mind taking part in this...diversion.
strings.fusion:
Are you sure it is wise to grant me so much power?
I might turn it against you someday...

However, the Void would eventually prove too powerful for him to control, and he was consumed by it--just like the warlock-king Enuo before him.

strings.description: Exdeath's bodyguard in another world where tales of the Crystals are told. Although Gilgamesh has enough power to eliminate the entire army of the Bal Kingdom, there is still something off about him. Having been tasked by Exdeath to keep a close watch on the prisoner Bartz and his companions, he eventually found himself cornered by Galuf who was attempting to rescue them. Gilgamesh then fled, but battled the party again once they reached the Big Bridge.
strings.summon:
Mwa ha ha ha ha!
I was just wondering what I would do, hadn't I been called.
strings.affinity: I'd like to go one-on-one with you sometime!
strings.fusion:
Oh no!
I just realized I have something important to do... Ha ha, just kidding!

Gilgamesh challenged Bartz and his party to countless fights only to flee from each one of them. Eventually, he even attacked them with a poor replica of the Excalibur, which lead Exdeath to banish him to the Void as a punishment for his incompetence. Although he was tasked with the protection of the legendary Genji equipment, rumor has it that Bartz and his party made off with it in one of their battles against him.
strings.summon:
The blue sky, the wide ocean...
I am full of good vibes.
Hey...who dares stand in my way?!
strings.evolution:
Alright, it's time to fight
with all I've got!
strings.affinity: I'd like to go one-on-one with you sometime!
