strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. She was born possessing magic, a thing thought to be impossible in her world. The Gestahlian Empire seized control of her mind and made her a Magitek soldier, forcing her to assist them in their goal of world domination. When she is sent to Narshe to seize the frozen esper Valigarmanda, the esper resonates with her and the effect is so profound that it knocks her unconscious. She is freed from the empire's control when she wakes, but loses all memory of who she is.
strings.summon:
Who...what am I?
Whatever should I do?
I know nothing...
strings.fusion:
People only seem to want power, don't they?
Do they really want to be like me?

effects: Physical damage (2.1x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. She was born possessing magic and used by the Gestahlian Empire as a tool for murder. In Narshe, she meets a young man named Locke who invites her to join the Returners and rebel against Gestahl. But even as she joins in their fight, she cannot silence the questions in her heart. Who is she? Why is she alone able to use magic? And is there something wrong with her if she cannot understand human emotion?
strings.summon:
I know not what I can do.
But I would use my power to protect someone...
strings.evolution: I wonder...will I be able to love people someday?
strings.fusion:
A new power?
It feels so warm...
Like hugging a moogle.

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. She was born possessing magic; the child of a union between an esper and a human woman. After being controlled by the Gestahlian Empire for most of her life, she finds herself nearly robbed of emotion. She tries to serve as a bridge between espers and humans, but cannot quell the anxiety she feels at being unable to understand the "love" that other people experience. Only after the world is destroyed and it falls to her to care for the orphans left behind in the destruction does she begin to understand what love is.
strings.summon:
My power is the power of humans and espers both.
Perhaps it might be of use to you?
strings.evolution:
The feeling that's been growing inside me...
I must fight to protect it!
strings.affinity:
Was I really any help?
I hope that I was able to protect someone by fighting like this...
strings.fusion:
The power of magic...
Before, I used it only to hurt others.
Now, I will use it to protect them!

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. Though magic was thought to have been lost from her world, she was born able to use it, and that rare ability made her a target of the Gestahlian Empire as a child. Emperor Gestahl stole her away from her parents and turned her into a tool to be used for his dreams of world domination. Under the empire's control, she was ordered to pilot a set of Magitek armor to invade the mining town of Narshe and seize the esper that had been found encased in ice within the mine there.
strings.summon:
...?
Where...am I?
strings.fusion:
...
Is this...power?

effects: Physical damage (2x MAG) to one enemy.

strings.description: A woman who appears in tales from another world, where she played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. She was born possessing magic and used as a tool of destruction by the Gestahlian Empire, which sought to conquer the entire world. The empire stole from her both her freedom and her emotions. She is powerful enough to destroy fifty of the empire's Magitek soldiers in mere minutes. But her future is forever altered when she meets an esper enclosed in ice in a small mining town...
strings.summon:
Who...are you?
I...I cannot remember.
strings.evolution: This is...my new power?
strings.affinity:
...I will go with you.
I have...decided.
strings.fusion:
...
Why...are you being kind to me?

effects: Physical damage (2.2x MAG) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. A treasure hunter in search of ancient riches, he hates being called a thief. He is also a member of the Returners, a resistance group fighting against the empire. In the mining town Narshe, he meets Terra, a young woman able to use magic but possessing no memory of who she is, and he resolves to protect the vulnerable girl. He leads her to Figaro, where King Edgar is looking for ways to strike back against the Gestahlian Empire.
strings.summon: A "thief"!? That's "treasure hunter" to you!
strings.affinity:
I wouldn't mind hunting for some treasures with you.
You should join me next time.
strings.fusion:
Hey! I think I got a bit stronger!
I think we can do this!

effects: Physical damage (2.2x ATK) to one enemy.
Steal item (+100%).

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. He is both a treasure hunter, in search of ancient riches, and a member of the Returners, a resistance group fighting against the empire. Once he is allied with Terra, Edgar, and Sabin, Locke works to do real damage to the empire. He travels to South Figaro for this purpose, and there meets Celes, an imperial general being persecuted as a traitor. He sees in her a shadow of his long lost love, motivating him to help her escape the town.
strings.summon:
Hm? Just where are we, anyway?
Does anyone have a map?
strings.evolution:
This glow...
It's like the power I felt from the magicite.
I feel like I can become even stronger!
strings.affinity:
I wouldn't mind hunting for some treasures with you.
You should join me next time.
strings.fusion:
I never should have left her side...
Oh. Nothing. I was just talking to myself.

effects: Physical damage (2.4x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A treasure-hunting young man who appears in tales from another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. He fought the Gestahlian Empire as a member of the resistance group known as the Returners. Unable to escape the guilt of failing to save his lover in the past, he searched for the legendary esper Phoenix, said to be able to revive the dead. This deep remorse is the real reason he cannot leave the side of any woman he meets who is in trouble. But meeting Celes begins to inspire a change in Locke's broken heart.
strings.summon:
Enter the realm's foremost treasure hunter!
Lockpicking? Infiltration? Leave it to me!
strings.evolution:
If I want to protect the ones I love...
Then I must be strong.
I don't ever want to feel that regret again.
strings.affinity:
I wouldn't mind hunting for some treasures with you.
You should join me next time.
strings.fusion:
As long as there are people who need
to be protected, I'll keep on fighting!

effects: Physical damage (2.6x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young man whose story is sung in a tale of espers and humans, from a distant world. King of the technologically advanced nation of Figaro and a brilliant engineer in his own right, he wields numerous unusual weapons of his own design. He is greatly beloved by his people, whose best interests he always keeps closest to his heart. He is also notorious as a ladies' man, quick to make advances on women of all ages and walks of life.
strings.summon: I'm Edgar of Figaro. We'll be meeting some lovely ladies on this journey, I take it?
strings.fusion:
I must get stronger yet.
If something were to happen to me,
all the world's ladies would grieve!

effects: Physical damage (2x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young man whose story is sung in a tale of espers and humans, from a distant world. King of the desert nation of Figaro, he is famed throughout the realm as a brilliant engineer and an equally shameless flirt. While maintaining a surface alliance with the Gestahlian Empire to protect his people, he secretly works with the Returners, awaiting the perfect moment to strike back at the evil regime. Upon encountering the young Terra and her prodigious magical powers, his battle with the Empire begins in earnest.
strings.summon: Allow me to show you the inventions that Figaro is famous for. Try not to faint with amazement, okay?
strings.evolution:
I will become a king that my father, my brother, and my people can be proud of...
The path may not be easy, but I will not give up!
strings.affinity:
I've got an idea for a new machine.
When I finish my prototype, I'll be sure to show it to you.
strings.fusion:
I have to keep myself in top condition.
You never know when you might
meet the lady of your dreams.

effects: Physical damage (2.2x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A youth whose story is sung in a tale of espers and humans, told in a distant world. Twin brother to Edgar, prince of Figaro, his distaste for the struggle of succession led him to leave his homeland at the age of seventeen. Strict training under the martial artist Duncan transformed a boy into a man strong of body and passionate of mind, and after reuniting with his brother at Mt. Kolts, he swears to join the fight against their common foe, the Empire.
strings.summon: I'm Sabin of Figaro! Now, who's ready to crush some skulls?
strings.fusion:
Dinner time!
I'm gonna eat till I burst!

effects: Fire physical damage (1.8x ATK) to all enemies.

Daño de fuego a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A youth whose story is sung in a tale of espers and humans, told in a distant world. Twin brother to Edgar, prince of Figaro, he left his homeland behind amidst the struggle for succession after the death of their father the king. Grateful to his brother for allowing him his freedom, he devoted himself to training in the martial arts, hoping to gain the strength needed to protect Edgar from further harm. Possessing a strong sense of justice that does not waver even after the world falls into ruin, he reunites with his lost teacher Duncan and masters his ultimate technique: the Phantom Rush.
strings.summon: Why don't we go together? I'm not big on philosophy or politics, but I can more than hold my own in a fight!
strings.evolution: The earth tried to swallow me up once or twice, but I just pried its jaws open and climbed back out!
strings.affinity:
Gahaha!
What do you say? Want to go train in the mountains with me?
strings.fusion:
I don't care who my enemy is!
I'm gonna smash 'em with a blitz!

effects: Air physical damage (2x ATK) to all enemies.

name: Vacuum Wave

strings.description: A lethal assassin from a tale of espers and humans, told in a distant world—his face and true identity cloaked in darkness. So cold that it is said he would kill even his best friend for a price, he counts his loyal canine partner Interceptor as his only true friend. He joins Locke and his companions for a time, only to disappear as soon as his debt is paid. Showing little attachment to the world of the living, he seems somehow to be always searching for a place to die.
strings.summon:
The reaper is always one step behind me.
I may bring misfortune to you...
strings.fusion:
I may leave you at any time.
But until then, you'll get your money's worth.

effects: Physical damage (2x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A lethal assassin from a tale of espers and humans, told in a distant world. Once a famed train robber, he lost the will to live after leaving his wounded friend and cohort Baram to die after their greatest heist. Wandering the realm in search of a place to die, his repeated meetings and partings with Locke and his friends rekindle in the depths of his heart the faintest feelings of friendship. In truth, he is father to Relm of Thamasa Village, a secret he takes to his grave.
strings.summon:
All that is left for me is blood and the battlefield...
Yet for some reason, I press on.
strings.evolution:
Hmm...
Let us see where this path of trials takes me.
strings.affinity:
To keep me at your side.
I don't know what you're thinking, but...you clearly have unusual tastes.
strings.fusion:
I suppose I can stay a bit longer.
I'm not leaving this world behind until
I've been paid my due.

effects: Physical damage (2.2x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A great warrior spoken of in another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. A samurai, he loyally serves the king of Doma in the East, just as he served the king's father before him. His courtly manners and love of old customs are yoked to a certain discomfort when it comes to modern machines and the fairer sex. Through the cruel machinations of Kefka, the Gestahlian Empire's court mage, he suffers the loss of his liege, and his beloved wife and son. Alone, he storms his enemies in a fury—and so it is that he encounters Sabin and comes to lend his strength to the Returners.
strings.summon:
I am Cyan, a knight of Doma.
From this day hence, my blade is thine!
strings.fusion:
The power courses through me...!
Mastery of the sword is within my reach!

effects: Physical damage (1.8x ATK) to all enemies.

name: Blade Dance
必殺劍【舞】
필살검 「무」
Danse du sabre
Schwerttanz
Baile de espadas
desc: 對全體敵人發動4次攻擊
Dégâts sur tous les ennemis x4
Daño a todos los enemigos x 4

strings.description: A great warrior spoken of in another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. He is a samurai, living a life of honor and bowing only to the ancient traditions of his culture. Through the cruel machinations of Kefka, the Gestahlian Empire's court mage, he lost both family and kingdom, which led him to join the rebel forces of the Returners, though even this new alliance cannot ease the regret he bears for failing to protect his family and his king. This darkness in his heart allows him to be plagued by demons, but with the aid of real friends he finally comes to terms with the past, becoming a true warrior at last.
strings.summon:
I shall go with thee!
We must not abandon this world!
strings.evolution:
I can dwell on the past no longer.
I must follow the path in which I believe...
strings.affinity:
It is as though thy breath and mine were one in our chests!
We shall not falter in our diligence to this cause!
strings.fusion:
The past lies in darkness. The dawn brings light.
We must look to the future now.
For this, I raise my sword!

effects: Physical damage (2x ATK) to all enemies.

name: Blade Fury
必殺劍【烈】

strings.description: A woman from another world who had a role to play in the war against the espers. She served as a top general in the Gestahlian Empire, tasked with many important missions, including the invasion of Maranda. As a child, she was implanted with magic by Cid, and raised to be a peerless force in battle. She wields her unnatural magic with ease, and her sword even seals the magic of others, making her one of the empire's greatest weapons, whose record of success in battle speaks for itself.
strings.summon: I am a Magitek Knight, genetically enhanced to serve the Empire. Are you friend or foe? I can see it in your eyes...
strings.affinity:
I have friends who trust me, and that trust I shall never betray.
My sword is yours, in good faith.
strings.fusion:
My past is behind me...
I have nothing to do with the Empire now!

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A general from another world who had a role to play in the war against the espers. She was implanted with artificial magic by the Gestahlian Empire. While peerless in battle, winning many commendations within the army, Celes carries silent doubts about the cruel tactics of her emperor. When she dares to voice these misgivings before him, however, she is branded a traitor and imprisoned. She is only saved from near-certain execution by a chance meeting with Locke.
strings.summon:
I can hold my own in battle.
I used to be a general of sorts, after all.
strings.evolution:
What is this power?
Is it magic? No... This is something different.
strings.affinity:
I have friends who trust me, and that trust I shall never betray.
My sword is yours, in good faith.
strings.fusion:
I may have served as a general to the Empire,
but I still know evil when I see it.
I will not lie to myself.

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A general from another world who had a role to play in the war against the espers. She was implanted with artificial magic by the Gestahlian Empire, and raised to be an unstoppable weapon—her skill with a blade equal to her skill with magic. Unable to tolerate the cruel methods of her emperor, she rebels and begins instead to work alongside the Returners, a rebel group opposing the empire. Her hard military nature means she has difficulty letting others see her emotions, but her new allies gradually help her to accept and embrace her own feelings.
strings.summon: Let us go together, and realize our dream of reclaiming this world.
strings.evolution:
I once thought there was no hope left.
But now I know...as long as we do not abandon ourselves, there is always hope.
strings.affinity:
I have friends who trust me, and that trust I shall never betray.
My sword is yours, in good faith.
strings.fusion:
I have someone who can accept me for who I am.
That is all I need to be strong. To keep fighting.

effects: Physical damage (2.7x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A soldier of the Gestahlian Empire who appears in a tale of humans and espers, told in a distant world. Together with his comrade Biggs, he is tasked with capturing a frozen esper discovered in the independent mining town of Narshe. They are opposed by the town guard but quickly dispatch all resistance with their powerful Magitek armor and the extraordinary abilities of their companion, a mysterious girl named Terra. Deep within the mine, they discover the mystical creature they seek.
strings.summon:
Wh-wh-whoa! Where am I!?
I was on a misson to find a frozen esper, and then...
strings.fusion:
Is this...
Is this MAGIC!?
No, really. Is it or not?

effects: Ice physical damage (1.8x MAG) to one enemy.

strings.description: A soldier of the Gestahlian Empire who appears in a tale of humans and espers, told in a distant world. Together with his comrade Biggs and the mysterious girl Terra, he is sent on a mission to retrieve a frozen esper from the remote mining town of Narshe. Wielding magic and Magitek, they make swift work of their opposition and arrive at the resting place of the esper Valigarmanda, only to be bathed in unholy light and whisked away, never to be seen again.
strings.summon:
Last thing I remember, I was looking for this esper, and...
Well, I guess I'm going with you now!
strings.evolution:
Heh heh...
I never thought I'd get to be this strong!
strings.affinity:
I really owe you!
I'll pay you back somehow, you'll see.
You can bank on it!
strings.fusion:
I hope you can give my Magitek Armor
the same kind of love and attention!

strings.description: A soldier of the Gestahlian Empire who appears in a tale of humans and espers, told in a distant world. Under orders from the Emperor, a despot bent on world domination, he ventures to the mining town of Narshe with his comrade Wedge to retrieve a frozen esper. Accompanying them is Terra, a young girl who, despite her prodigious magical powers, is enslaved to the Empire by the binding crown on her head. By her magicks and the formidable Magitek armor, they dispatch the defenses of Narshe and come face-to-face with the esper they seek.
strings.summon:
Wedge and I were looking for this esper, and then...
Wait, where am I? Who are you?
strings.fusion:
Hm...
Maybe being strong wouldn't be so bad!

effects: Fire physical damage (1.8x MAG) to one enemy.

strings.description: A soldier of the Gestahlian Empire whose story is told in a tale of espers and humans. Together with his comrade Wedge and a mysterious girl named Terra possessed of prodigious magical powers, he embarks on a mission to the mining town of Narshe in search of a frozen esper. The band withstands resistance from the Narshe town guard, and Ymir, a monster dwelling in the mines, to finally arrive at the resting place of the esper Valigarmanda. In an instant, however, they are bathed in unholy light and whisked away, never to be seen again.
strings.summon:
What is this place? And where did that esper go!?
I'll just have to follow you and find out!
strings.evolution:
Heh heh...
Maybe now I won't have to hide behind that girl anymore in battles!
strings.affinity:
I was a little afraid for a minute there.
Wasn't feeling too sure about my future.
But I'm glad you brought me here!
strings.fusion:
If I'm this strong, I might even be able
to stand up against a mage's power!

effects: Fire physical damage (2x MAG) to one enemy.

strings.description: A mage from another world where magic and espers once lived. His mind was irreparably damaged by an infusion of artificial magic, but his emperor still places a great deal of trust in this madman. He is as fickle as a child, and just as quick to explode in anger, but these are tantrums with a death toll—he even kills women and children indiscriminately. Even his fellow soldiers in the Gestahlian Army hate and fear Kefka for his madness and cruelty.
strings.summon: Hee hee! Nothing beats the sweet music of hundreds of voices screaming in unison!
strings.affinity:
Uwee-hee-hee!
Clearly, you can recognize a real treasure when you see one!
strings.fusion:
Uwee-hee-hee!
Oooh! It's warm to the touch!
What a lovely treasure!

His mind has been broken by the magic he was implanted with, leaving him emotionally stunted and devoid of morals. He murdered the entire population of Doma without hesitation, and shows no remorse for any of his heartless acts. He is obsessed with the espers and the great power that he could gain from them.
strings.summon: Son of a submariner! You want my powers? You must be as crazy as I am! Hehehehe!
strings.evolution:
Wh-what is this!? Such tremendous power!
Wave after wave of pure, magical energy...!
strings.affinity:

SOOO BEAUTIFUL!

strings.description: A mage from another world where magic and espers once lived. He served the Gestahlian Empire, but his mind is twisted and warped. He hunts the espers to harvest magicite from them, and his lust for power explodes as it goes unchecked by those around him. He betrays his own emperor without a second thought, then lets the Warring Triad run wild. Amid the chaos, he is reborn as a god of destruction who wants nothing more than to see the world burn.
strings.summon: Looking to rain down devastation and destruction? Well, why didn't you say so sooner!
strings.evolution: Yes! Yes, this is the power I was looking for! Sorry for becoming too strong for you!
strings.affinity:
Uwee-hee-hee!
Clearly, you can recognize a real treasure when you see one!
strings.fusion:
Are you sure about this?
You never know what might happen
if you give me too much power!

strings.description: A man who appears in tales from another world, where he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. This loyal soldier of the Gestahlian Empire refused a Magitek infusion, having achieved the rank of general depending only on the strength of his arm, and the skill of his sword. He values fair play and honor in battle, with a special hatred for underhanded strategies. Respectful of all lives, even those of his enemies, his character earns him esteem from both his own troops and the people of hostile nations. He bears a deep hatred for Kefka, for a man of such integrity cannot forgive the mage's evil ways.
strings.summon:
I am General Leo of the Gestahlian Empire.
I shall lend you my blade.
strings.affinity:
From now on, I will fight as befits a general.
I will not bring shame to myself or you.
strings.fusion: I will not rush into an unnecessary battle.I will not throw away a human life.

effects: Physical damage (2.1x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A general in the Gestahlian Empire who appears in tales from another world. There he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. In an empire that depends on the power of magic to rule the world, he is a true warrior who relies only on his own strength and skill. When Leo is summoned back to Gestahl during the invasion of Doma Castle, and Kefka is given command, he warns the mage against using cruelty and foul play. But Kefka pays no heed to this advice, and poisons the inhabitants of Doma Castle as soon as Leo is gone.
strings.summon:
I am not familiar with this place.
Could it be...?
strings.evolution:
Magic is a powerful thing...
But it has destroyed many lives.
What is this power, really?
strings.affinity:
From now on, I will fight as befits a general.
I will not bring shame to myself or you.
strings.fusion:
I knew that girl was suffering...
And still I did not put a stop to it
I am no better than Kefka...

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A general in the Gestahlian Empire who appears in tales from another world. There he played a role in the great conflict between humankind and espers. His integrity and code of honor win him respect from enemies and allies alike. He travels to Thamasa with Terra, Locke, and the others, to try to establish a peace with the espers who have appeared from the esper world. Furious at the cruelty of Kefka, who strikes out at esper after esper to reap magicite from them, he challenges the mage to battle. But Kefka resorts to his usual dirty tricks, and the mighty general Leo falls for the last time.
strings.summon:
A world of espers...
I pray that one day, we can live together with them in harmony.
strings.evolution:
Such strength...
I will use this power as is only proper.
strings.affinity:
From now on, I will fight as befits a general.
I will not bring shame to myself or you.
strings.fusion:
This power...
I swear that I will not use it for any
dishonorable purpose.

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. He is a lone orphan, adopted as a small child by the troupe of theatrical thieves known as Tantalus, and their leader, Baku. He was raised by Tantalus and considers the group his family, but even having such a home cannot erase his longing to discover his true roots. He has a bright and cheery disposition, and a strong sense of justice for a thief, but his womanizing tendencies keep the shine off of this diamond in the rough. The moment he spots a cute girl, he will pull out every trick in his bag to try to pick her up.
strings.summon:
There's more to you than meets the eye, huh?
Okay, just leave it to me!
strings.fusion:
Oh, please!
You don't have to worry about a thing.
Leave it all in the hands of master thief Zidane!

effects: Physical damage (2.1x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. He is a member of the Tantalus Theater Troupe, a band of traveling thieves who attempt to kidnap Princess Garnet of Alexandria. Finding himself captivated by Garnet, who is troubled by the changes in her beloved mother's behavior, he pledges himself to her cause. As they set out on a journey, together with the young black mage Vivi and an Alexandrian knight named Steiner, he comes closer to the truth about the two moons in Gaia's night sky, and the roots he has searched for all his life.
strings.summon:
Of course I'm coming too.
Why? Because I'm sticking with you!
strings.evolution:
Don't judge a guy by his looks!
All you need are dreams and the fire to go after them.
strings.fusion:
The strongest don't need to show off
their strength.
After all, the sly eagle
doesn't...uh...doesn't...
Wait, how did it go again?

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. On a quest to help Princess Garnet of Alexandria save her kingdom, he learns of the existence of Terra, a foreign planet trying to take over Gaia and replace its people. Confronted with the knowledge that he is not, in fact, human, but a tool created by the Terrans to take over Gaia, he is overwhelmed by a self-destructive despair. But the friends and allies who have traveled with him so long draw him from his shell and help him to accept himself as he is, lending him the courage he needs to fight his fate.
strings.summon:
Who says you need a reason to help people?
We're all in the same boat, right?
strings.evolution:
I'm fine. I know I'm not alone.
And now I have a place that I can call home.
strings.affinity:
I've made it this far because you were right here with me.
Let's see it through to the end, partner.
strings.fusion:
I've been searching all my life...
For a blue light I can only half-remember.
If I find it, will I know where I belong?

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A young black mage from the distant world of Gaia. While attending a play in the kingdom of Alexandria, he is swept up in Zidane's plot to kidnap Princess Garnet, and before long joins in on his new companions' quest. Raised with no knowledge of the world or his own origins, he is at first timid and dependent on others, but in the course of his journey gradually gains the courage to face the truth of the past.
strings.summon:
I... I have to find out what I am.
Am I even human?
strings.fusion:
My magic...
Was it made to hurt people?

effects: Fire magical damage (1.8x MAG) to all enemies.

strings.description: A young black mage from the distant world of Gaia. He lived each day with no knowledge of who he truly was, until, while journeying with Zidane and his friends, he came to learn that he was an artificial being designed by the kingdom of Alexandria as a weapon. Though his confidence falters after finding out that he is an instrument of destruction that will one day "stop," through his encounters with his companions and fellow black mages, he finds the courage to face the devastating truth about his identity.
strings.summon:
I'm scared, and confused...but I must press on.
Please, take me with you!
strings.evolution:
Zidane... Grandpa...
I think I'm beginning to understand what it means to live.
strings.affinity:
Journeying together is fun, isn't it?
I hope you'll let me come along with you.
strings.fusion:
My magic...
Does it help? I hope it does...

effects: Fire magical damage (2x MAG) to all enemies.

strings.description: A princess who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. The most beautiful princess in Alexandria's history, her name was known far and wide. She felt sympathy and concern for the people of the kingdom, and was greatly pained by her mother Queen Brahne's unbending resolve in invading other countries. On her sixteenth birthday, in an attempt to get advice about her mother from her uncle Cid, regent of Lindblum, she asked Zidane, a thief who had broken into the castle, to kidnap her.
strings.summon:
Enough of this princess business;
I want to find out who I really am.
However...
strings.affinity:
We should help those who help us.
It took me a long time to understand that. Now, it is time for me to help you.
strings.fusion: It was not for my own sake that I asked Zidane to kidnap me. What can I do to protect my homeland?

effects: Fill Esper gauge by 4-7.
No effect.

strings.description: The princess of Alexandria who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. Dismayed by her mother Queen Brahne's resolution to invade other countries, she asked Zidane to kidnap her so that she could make her way to Cid, regent of Lindblum. Though her concern for her mother and her country was genuine, having been raised in a castle she knew little of the world, leading her to come across as somewhat self-important during her first journey. However, after hiding away under the false name Dagger, she came to know more of the world, growing more mature in the process.
strings.summon:
Where are we?
I thought I heard a familiar song just a moment ago...
strings.evolution:
I-I'll do my best...
Is this enough?
I guess I'm still getting used to this.
strings.affinity:
We should help those who help us.
It took me a long time to understand that. Now, it is time for me to help you.
strings.fusion: I will no longer blame my hardships on anyone or anything else. I'll face my problems and overcome them!

effects: Fill Esper gauge by 5-8.
No effect.

strings.description: A Burmecian woman who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. Despite being a dragon knight, the pride of Burmecia, she was forbidden to reenter her own country once she had left. Yet her pride in being a dragon knight never wavered, and she remained eternally zealous. She had a cool demeanor, with an old-fashioned way of speaking, and though she was quick to rebuke her companions, she felt very deeply for them. She was also an old friend of Zidane.
strings.summon:
I am Freya of Burmecia.
Might you require my assistance?
strings.affinity:
We should help those who help us.
It took me a long time to understand that. Now, it is time for me to help you.
strings.fusion:
To keep remembering is painful,
but how much more dreadful it is
to forget...

effects: Physical damage (2.1x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A Burmecian woman who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. As a proud dragon knight, she left her home country and traveled the world in search of a certain someone. She was reunited with her old friend Zidane during the Festival of the Hunt, which took place in Lindblum. Afterward, having learned of the attack on her home country Burmecia, she decided to join Zidane and his allies. Her fighting style, which took advantage of powerful jump attacks, was both graceful and beautiful.
strings.summon:
There's a great disturbance in the air.
Could there be something about to happen?
strings.evolution: I shall unveil my powerful spear skills in the battle to come.
strings.affinity:
It was destiny that brought me to
someone as soft-hearted as yourself.
I look forward to our continuing friendship.
strings.fusion:
Hmph... What manner of power is this?
I feel as if I have become lighter.

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A Burmecian woman who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. She was a dragon knight who used her powerful jumping skills to unleash spear attacks. She left her home country to search the world for her lost lover, a quest that led her to spend some time working together with Zidane. Later, after the two friends met in Lindblum for the second time, they became caught up in events that would shake the world to its very core. Before long, Freya would also be reunited with her lover. However...
strings.summon:
Those who commit themselves to a path are destined to encounter others walking the same path.
...Surely.
strings.evolution:
Even if I am to be forgotten
and never thought of again...
I have decided... I will NOT look back!
strings.affinity:
It was destiny that brought me to
someone as soft-hearted as yourself.
I look forward to our continuing friendship.
strings.fusion: They say strong memories can grant one power. Who would have known so many memories existed in this world...

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A fighter who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. He was known as the Flaming Amarant, thanks to his shock of bright red hair as much as his fearsome power. Having grown up alone, he made his way through the world with two fists in front of him. Because of this, he was unable to bring himself to trust others, and was rarely heard to speak. Still, somehow, he found himself chasing after the man with the tail.
strings.summon:
How about that?
I'll stick around and see what you are truly made of.
strings.affinity: We've been pointlessly shackled together for a long time now. Still... No sense throwing away perfectly good shackles.
strings.fusion:
The most important rule for survival:
If it hinders you, cast it aside.
I won't make any attachments.

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A fighter who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. Having fought his way alone through the world, he was reluctant to put trust in others. When he was a guard in Treno he set a trap to capture the thief Zidane, but ended up being framed by him instead. This set him in pursuit of Zidane, though ultimately not for revenge, but out of suspicion for the actions of a man who, despite having the power to lay him low, chose not to.
strings.summon:
I am the Flaming Amarant.
At least, that is what I was once called...
strings.evolution:
Life for winners; death for losers.
I have lived by this ironclad rule.
strings.affinity: We've been pointlessly shackled together for a long time now. Still... No sense throwing away perfectly good shackles.
strings.fusion: I fail to understand why one with such power would choose friendship instead...

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A fighter who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. Even as an assassin appointed by Brahne herself, he was unable to subdue Zidane, who once threw his own trap back in his face. Curious as to why Zidane didn't deal him the final blow, and interested to see exactly what kind of man he was, Amarant decided to join his former adversary. Once a man who believed the strong have no need of the weak, the longer he spent with his new comrades, the more he changed.
strings.summon:
What do I really want to do?
What am I truly capable of?
These are the questions I want answers to.
strings.evolution:
Friends, huh?
Pah; that guy's made me soft in the head.
strings.affinity: We've been pointlessly shackled together for a long time now. Still... No sense throwing away perfectly good shackles.
strings.fusion:
How meddlesome you are...
You remind me of that guy...

effects: Physical damage (2.7x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A bounty hunter who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. Young and dark-skinned, this self-proclaimed "most beautiful bounty hunter in the world" was somewhat full of herself. Her dream was to live a life of luxury, and to that end there was no job she would not undertake. Teaming up with the fearsomely powerful Amarant, another of Queen Brahne of Alexandria's hired assassins, she confronted her target Zidane. Despite her slender stature, she could swing an axe the size of her own body.
strings.summon:
I am the beautiful bounty hunter, Lani!
You have quite the discerning eye,
to recognize my strength! Although...
I suppose the giant axe is a giveaway.
strings.affinity:
I guess it can't be helped.
Would you mind if I called
you my partner?
strings.fusion:
This brings me one step closer
to my luxurious dream life.
I'll live like a queen!

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A bounty hunter who appears in tales of Gaia, a world foreign to this one. This self-proclaimed "most beautiful bounty hunter" was full of pride; a pride soon confounded by her inability to handle minor issues. As an assassin hired to find Garnet of Alexandria, she stood in Zidane's way, but since her partner Amarant regarded taking a hostage to achieve her goals a cowardly move, she found herself alone. It is also believed that she took part in Lindblum's Festival of the Hunt.
strings.summon:
The beautiful bounty hunter Lani
shall accompany you.
Is that a tear of joy I see?
strings.evolution:
Heh heh.
Would you like to try out my
ever-growing axe for yourself?
strings.affinity:
I guess it can't be helped.
Would you mind if I called
you my partner?
strings.fusion:
Oh my...
This is going to make me
even more beautiful!

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A beautiful and cruel angel of death who sought to destroy the world of Gaia from the inside out. Whispering in the ear of Alexandria's Queen Brahne, he convinces her of the advantages of using summons and artificial black mages, created from the Mist, to achieve her goals. In doing so, he achieves his own goal: a war that spreads across every corner of the continent. Kuja possesses an androgynous beauty, an unforgiving pride and a sadistic disdain for others. His flair for dramatic speeches reveals his narcissistic tendencies as well. He looks down on all other creatures, including Queen Brahne and the black mages he creates, as no more than pawns in his game.
strings.summon:
All the world's a stage.
Mind if I join you in watching the show?
strings.fusion:
Beautiful!
This cascade of power gives blessing to our victory!

effects: Magical damage (2.1x MAG) to all enemies.

strings.description: A beautiful and cruel angel of death who sought to destroy the world of Gaia from the inside out. In truth he is a Genome, an artificial lifeform created to host the souls of the people of Terra, another world that seeks to merge with Gaia. He receives his orders from Garland, a being whose aim is to safeguard Terra's future. To throw Gaia into confusion and aid the Terrans' takeover, Kuja uses Queen Brahne of Alexandria and others as tools in his dark schemes. He is an older sibling of sorts to Zidane, but when he saw the potential within his "little brother" and the hopes pinned upon him, he abandoned the child Zidane on Gaia.
strings.summon: Never would I have imagined running into you in a place like this. It must be fate.
strings.evolution:
Oh, how I've longed for this day!
The day I might cast away this mask and reveal my true self.
strings.fusion:
The weak lose their freedom to the strong.
Such is the way of the world.

effects: Magical damage (2.3x MAG) to all enemies.

strings.description: A beautiful and cruel angel of death who sought to destroy the world of Gaia from the inside out. He is a Genome, an artificial life that should not have independent will—and yet he does. Despite this "flaw," he is ordered by Garland to throw Gaia into chaos and help their home world absorb it. He plots to betray Garland, who sees him as no more than a tool to be used. But he falls into a spiral of despair when he learns that his lifespan is nearly spent and becomes self-destructive, intending to take the entire world down with him.
strings.summon:
This is not mere chance.
No, this is the power of fate.
strings.evolution:
It is the providence of nature that only the strong survive.
That is why I needed strength.
strings.affinity:
It appears you're not as feeble-minded as I thought, if you can understand my purposes.
Why don't you smile?
This is quite some praise.
strings.fusion: Yes! This is the power I've longed for!

effects: Magical damage (2.5x MAG) to all enemies.

strings.description: A Tarutaru sorceress from the distant world of Vana'diel. Possessed of formidable magical powers, she serves as minister of the Orastery, Windurst's Department of Magic. Her petite and charming exterior belies a proud, fiery, vainglorious personality that can prove hazardous to friends and enemies alike. Few things are more dire than being caught in a blaze of Shantotto's fire.
strings.summon:
Stand back and leave the fights to me.
I can show you a thing or three!
strings.fusion:
Ohohohohoho!
My powers of destruction
require no introduction!

effects: Fire and lightning magical damage (1.8x MAG) to all enemies.

name: Tiny Torrent
要爆發了哦！
더는 못 참겠어요!
Exaspération
Ich krieg die Krise!
Pequeño torrente
desc: Fire and lightning damage to all enemies
對全體敵人發動火和雷屬性攻擊
적 전체에 불속성 및 번개속성 피해
Dégâts de feu et de foudre sur tous les ennemis
Daño de fuego y rayo a los enemigos

strings.description: A formidable black mage from the distant world of Vana'diel. One of the most brilliant minds in Windurst, she serves as a professor of magical arts in and heads the Orastery, the republic's Department of Magic. Known for being "as high-and-mighty as Yutungah's fiery mountain, and as rough-cut as the rocky Gustaberg Ranges-wanges," she is a veritable force of nature who wreaks havoc on both friends and foes without discrimination. It is rumored that her one regret is never marrying, but don't bring this up in her presence without proper havoc-resistant armor.
strings.summon:
Are you, perchance, my newest pupil?
Watch out! Lessons may be brutal.
Ohohohoho!
strings.evolution:
I wonder, is it even right?
For one sweet mage to wield such might!
strings.affinity:
You're utterly fantastic!
And I'm not being sarcastic.
Don't just stand and dumbly drool─I'm praising you, you stupid fool!
strings.fusion:
Ohohoho!
My blood is on fire!
I'll make you perspire!

effects: Ice and lightning magical damage (2x MAG) to all enemies.

name: Ruin Impulse
破壞衝動
파괴 충동
Pulsion meurtrière
Zerstörungsdrang
Impulso de ruina
desc: Ice and lightning damage to all enemies
對全體敵人發動冰和雷屬性攻擊
적 전체에 얼음속성 및 번개속성 피해
Dégâts de glace et de foudre sur tous les ennemis
Daño de frío y rayo a los enemigos

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. He lost his elder brother in the war with the Archadian Empire and was left alone in the world. He lives in the slums of the Royal City of Rabanastre, the capital of Dalmasca, and makes ends meet by doing odd jobs for a shopkeeper named Migelo—and by stealing from the Archadians who occupy the city. Though he hates the empire, which took both his brother and his homeland from him, it is not enough to inspire him to any greater action. He drifts through his days with only vague dreams of becoming a sky pirate to keep him moving.
strings.summon:
If something's stolen from me, I'll steal it back!
Simple enough, don't you think?
strings.fusion:
It's not like I want to live this way...
I want to do something more than this.

effects: Physical damage (2.1x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. He lost his elder brother, his only family left in the world, during the war with the Archadian Empire. The desire for vengeance within him remains nebulous, channeled into nothing more than petty thieving. He decides to sneak into the Archadian-occupied palace to "take back" some of the Dalmascan wealth that the Archadian forces have seized. This is how he meets Ashe, the crown princess of his fallen country, and the sky pirate Balthier. This is how his journey with them begins.
strings.summon:
I'm Captain Basch fon Rosenburg of Dalmasca!
...Pretty convincing, don't you think?
strings.evolution:
One step closer to being a real sky pirate!
All I need now is my own airship...
strings.fusion:
I'll steal some treasure and treat everyone
to a real meal for once!
No sweat!

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales of Ivalice, a world foreign to this one. After meeting the princess of his fallen homeland, he began a journey to rid Dalmasca of its occupiers. It took a long time for him to accept the death of his brother, who was painted as a traitor after dying in service to their homeland. But by coming to know Basch, a knight also entangled in the plots surrounding his brother, and making a connection with Ashe, who has similarly lost so many she loved, he finally learns to move onward to the future.
strings.summon: I'm coming with you. I'm betting a great adventure awaits us!
strings.evolution:
I was always running away...
But not anymore. Now, I'm looking toward the future!
strings.affinity:
I'll fight with you until the end.
We came this far together.
We'll finish this together, too!
strings.fusion:
Someday I'll be the fastest pirate in the skies.
We'll see who's the leading man then!

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A young lady from the world of Ivalice, beyond the Farplane. After losing her family to the war, she was fostered together with her childhood friend Vaan. Earning her keep at a sundry shop in Rabanastre, she is a leader-like figure among her fellow orphans, who respect her for her wisdom and gentle disposition. She worries for the impulsive Vaan, who seethes with hatred for the Empire after the death of his brother.
strings.summon:
I can come along, right?
Come on, I won't get in the way.
strings.fusion:
Look, just don't do anything crazy, okay?
I'm here, too. We can do this together.

effects: Light physical damage (1.8x ATK) to all enemies.

name: Intercession
生殺予奪
생살여탈
Danse des âmes
Seelenmarter
Conjuro
desc: 對全體敵人發動光屬性攻擊
Dégâts de lumière sur tous les ennemis
Daño de luz a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A young lady sung of in tales of the far-off world of Ivalice. Orphaned after the war, she was taken in and raised with her childhood friend Vaan, the two remaining inseparable until Vaan is caught consorting with pirates in the palace and led away in chains. Penelo is subsequently kidnapped by the ruthless bounty hunter Ba'Gamnan, but the friends are eventually reunited, once again becoming close companions on their quest. Penelo warmly watches over her friend as he grows from his experiences.
strings.summon:
I'm tired of being alone.
So I'm coming with you! No worries, right?
strings.evolution:
Maybe it's time I become a sky pirate, too!
...Just kidding!
strings.affinity:
I wish I could show you Ivalice, even just once.
It's an amazing place, you know?
strings.fusion:
Just tell me if you feel sad.
I bet that one of my dances would
put a smile on your face!
Though...I've still got a lot to learn.

effects: Light physical damage (2x ATK) to all enemies.

name: Evanescence
雲散霧消
운산무소
Rayonnement
Lichtwirbel
Volatilización
desc: 對全體敵人發動光屬性攻擊
Dégâts de lumière sur tous les ennemis
Daño de luz a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A warrior of the viera, a rabbit-eared race, whose tale is told in the distant world of Ivalice. Atypical of her reclusive people, she left her homeland to venture into hume society, where she fights as the trusted comrade of the sky pirate Balthier. She is a formidable figure, possessed of great knowledge, experience, and the heightened sensitivity to Mist unique to her kind, and provides cool, confident advice to her companions while keeping a professional distance.
strings.summon:
I am a viera who has discarded Wood and village.
I know not if I can be of help to you.
strings.fusion:
This power...it is different from the Mist.
But it is not a bad power.

effects: Physical damage (2x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A storied warrior of the viera, a rabbit-eared race hailing from the distant world of Ivalice. She is the fast friend and loyal comrade of Balthier, the cocky and cunning sky pirate who claims to pilot the fastest vessel in the world. Possessed of deep knowledge of history and tradition, the heightened sensitivity to Mist unique to her kind, and expert skill with airship technology, she proves an impressive ally to Ashe and her companions.
strings.summon:
Show me your decision.
Will you hold your own, or run away?
strings.evolution:
The power of the world of humes that I found after leaving the woods behind.
I suppose...it suits me after all.
strings.affinity:
If I had not left the Wood and lived with the humes, there is much I would never have known.
You are one of those things I would have missed.
strings.fusion:
This burning from within...!
But do not worry...
I will remain calm.

effects: Physical damage (2.2x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A holy man from the distant world of Ivalice, where he serves as Gran Kiltias of the Kiltia sect. Known as a Dreamsage, he possesses nigh limitless knowledge due to his ability to enter the dreams of others. A stern, austere figure, his influence extends across the realm. When the princess Ashe arrives seeking his blessing to rebuild the Kingdom of Dalmasca, he foresees the danger that awaits her and warns her against folly.
strings.summon: I dream. For reality and illusion are a duality, two parts of a whole.
strings.fusion:
Great power tests a person.
It is a difficult thing to hold on to,
while also holding onto yourself.

effects: Cure Poison, Blind, Sleep, Silence, Paralyze, Confusion, Disease, Stone for one ally.

name: Oracle of Dreams
神明託夢
꿈속의 신탁
Oracle des rêves
Traumorakel
Oráculo soñador
desc: Cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for one ally
治療1名隊員的中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化狀態
아군 1명의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 회복
Soigne poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification pour un allié
Heilt 1 Verb. von Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus. Virus und Stein, ein Verb.
Cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie de uno

strings.description: A holy man from the distant world of Ivalice. When visited by Ashe, a princess of Dalmasca, a land since ruthlessly conquered by the Archadian Empire, who now seeks the power to rebuild her former kingdom, he perceives the desire for revenge in her heart and issues a stern warning. It is said that it is he who once imprisoned the great wyrm Fafnir.
strings.summon:
Forbear mere speech, for your dreams are known to me.
I shall offer what strength I can.
strings.evolution:
This power...
It harks back to the day I sealed away that great wyrm...
strings.affinity:
Your dreams intrigue me...
Yes, I think I should enjoy seeing where your path leads.
strings.fusion:
May Faram the Father lead you in his
light, to wherever your path may end.

effects: Cure Poison, Blind, Sleep, Silence, Paralyze, Confusion, Disease, Stone for all allies.

name: Faram's Light
法拉姆之光
파람의 빛
Lumière de Faram
Farams Licht
Luz de Faram
desc: Cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for all allies
治療全體隊員的各種異常狀態
Soigne poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification pour tous les alliés
Heilt von Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus. Virus und Stein, alle Verb.
Cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, conf, enf y pie de todos

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Lightning is a soldier from the floating continent of Cocoon, ruled by servants of the gods known as the fal'Cie. Her unsociable and serious demeanor often makes her seem indifferent to those around her, when in reality she hides a gentle soul that drives her to face peril boldly to protect those she loves. Lightning gave up her post as a soldier to save her sister Serah, who had become a prisoner of the fal'Cie, and boarded a train full of unjustly exiled citizens to defy the fate the gods had chosen for her.
strings.summon:
Keep your eyes in front.
I'll watch the rear.
strings.affinity: When it looks like there's no hope left, we look harder until we find some. Always have, always will.
strings.fusion:
I don't take orders from fal'Cie.
How I live is up to me.

effects: Physical damage (2.7x ATK) to one enemy.
Reduce DEF by 20% for 3 turn(s) to one enemy.

name: Army of One
王牌驅散
신 드라이브
Combo éclair
Ein-Mann-Armee
Andanada
desc: Damage and reduce DEF for one enemy
Dégâts et réduit la DÉF d'un ennemi
Schaden und ABW runter, ein Ziel
Daña y reduce la DEF de un enemigo

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Lightning chose to fight against the gods' servants, the fal'Cie, to save her sister Serah. Unfortunately, this resulted in Lightning herself being cursed as a "l'Cie." The l'Cie were believed to be the enemies of peace; thus Lightning and her fellow l'Cie came to be persecuted by various enemies. Although not always in agreement, the l'Cie formed strong bonds with one another, seeking to fulfill their Focus in defiance of the gods.
strings.summon: Fighting without hope is no way to live. It's just a way to die. Now, show me the hope you've found.
strings.evolution:
Destroying the world isn't salvation.
I'll keep fighting until the end.
This power will give me the strength.
strings.affinity: When it looks like there's no hope left, we look harder until we find some. Always have, always will.
strings.fusion:
It's not a question of can or can't.
There are some things in life you just do.

effects: Physical damage (2.9x ATK) to one enemy.
Reduce DEF by 30% for 3 turn(s) to one enemy.

name: Army of One
王牌驅散
신 드라이브
Combo éclair
Ein-Mann-Armee
Andanada
desc: Damage and reduce DEF for one enemy
Dégâts et réduit la DÉF d'un ennemi
Schaden und ABW runter, ein Ziel
Daña y reduce la DEF de un enemigo

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Snow was the leader of NORA, a group that refused to rely on the fal'Cie that ruled the floating continent of Cocoon. He was a fiery young man, often diving headfirst into danger, whose irrepressible spirit always had him in the front lines fighting to protect his comrades. When Snow learned that his lover Serah has been taken captive by the fal'Cie, he headed toward the mysterious "Vestige" to save her.
strings.summon:
The hero has arrived!
Time to get this party started!
strings.affinity: If we keep fighting, we may give hope to someone else. That's what being a real hero is all about.
strings.fusion:
I'm pumped!
Now let's take these new powers for a test ride.

effects: Physical damage (5x ATK) to one enemy. Ignore cover.

name: Sovereign Fist
至高神拳
룰러 피스트
Poing du Tyran
Überlegene Faust
Puño feroz
desc: Partial unmitigated damage to one enemy
對1名敵人發動無視部分防禦的攻擊
Dégâts en partie fixes sur un ennemi
Daño absoluto parcial a un enemigo

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Snow chose to fight against the gods' servants, the fal'Cie, to save his lover Serah. Unfortunately, this resulted in him being cursed as a "l'Cie." However, even as a victim of relentless persecution, Snow never wavered in his determination to save Serah. Though his naive optimism was the cause of many disagreements with his comrades, his tireless fighting spirit ultimately sustained the hope of his fellow l'Cie.
strings.summon: I'm just a big dummy, so let me draw all the enemy fire, all right?
strings.evolution: I won't sit here waiting. I'm going to build the future with my own two hands.
strings.affinity: If we keep fighting, we may give hope to someone else. That's what being a real hero is all about.
strings.fusion:
I'll never give up.
I'll protect my friends and save the world. I promise.

effects: Physical damage (5.4x ATK) to one enemy. Ignore cover.

name: Sovereign Fist
至高神拳
룰러 피스트
Poing du Tyran
Überlegene Faust
Puño feroz

對1名敵人發動無視部分防禦的攻擊
Dégâts en partie fixes sur un ennemi
Daño absoluto parcial a un enemigo

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Snow chose to fight against the gods' servants, the fal'Cie, to save his lover Serah. Unfortunately, this resulted in him being cursed as a "l'Cie." As he and his friends struggled to understand the Focus they had been given, Snow's unflagging desire to save Serah inspired his comrades, pushing them forward. His faith in Serah's plea to save Cocoon would ultimately lead him to rebel against the fate the gods had determined for him.
strings.summon:
Saving the world...
I may not be the best man for the job, but running away wouldn't be very heroic, now would it?
strings.evolution: We have a Focus to fulfill, but even that is something that we choose for ourselves.
strings.affinity: If we keep fighting, we may give hope to someone else. That's what being a real hero is all about.
strings.fusion:
Forget the l'Cie.
If we have hope, we'll make it somehow. I'll never give up; you can count on that!

effects: Physical damage (5.8x ATK) to one enemy. Ignore cover.

name: Sovereign Fist
至高神拳
룰러 피스트
Poing du Tyran
Überlegene Faust
Puño feroz
desc: Partial unmitigated damage to one enemy
對1名敵人發動無視部分防禦的攻擊
Dégâts en partie fixes sur un ennemi
Daño absoluto parcial a un enemigo

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Vanille was an innocent girl who knew no fear, yet at times she might suddenly succumb to the grief hidden deep inside. Though she understood little of day-to-day life in the fal'Cie-ruled society of Cocoon, she was very knowledgeable about "Pulse," the world below, and the cursed beings known as the "l'Cie." The source of her knowledge, however, remained a mystery.
strings.summon:
Did a miracle bring me to this world?
Or was it the work of a blasted Focus?
strings.affinity:
Wishes can come true.
But not if you just wait around for a miracle. That's why I promise to protect you.
strings.fusion: If it's too much to cope with, face it later. That's what you told me, right?

effects: Instant KO (55%) to all enemies.

name: Death
致命一擊
데스
Mort
Tod
Necro
desc: 對全體敵人施加致死一擊效果
Met instantanément tous les ennemis KO
Causa K.O. instantáneo a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Vanille was an innocent girl with little knowledge of everyday things, yet prodigious knowledge of the legendary "l'Cie" and the world of "Pulse" that lay below. She eventually boarded a train full of unjustly exiled Cocoon citizens, and in the midst of the commotion that arose between the military and the people, ran into a young boy named Hope. Together they then headed toward the mysterious "Vestige," though to what end, no one knew.
strings.summon: The truth is...I've always run from my fate as a l'Cie. But I won't run anymore.
strings.evolution: Let's keep the flame of hope burning in our hearts and achieve the impossible!
strings.affinity:
Wishes can come true.
But not if you just wait around for a miracle. That's why I promise to protect you.
strings.fusion: I won't run anymore; I promised I wouldn't. This time I'm going to fight back!

effects: Instant KO (70%) to all enemies.

name: Death
致命一擊
데스
Mort
Tod
Necro
desc: 對全體敵人施加致死一擊效果
Met instantanément tous les ennemis KO
Causa K.O. instantáneo a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Sazh worked as a pilot of passenger ships in Cocoon, the floating continent ruled by servants of the gods known as the fal'Cie. However, mysterious circumstances led him to board the same train, full of unjustly exiled civilians, as did Lightning, and he came to join her despite his lack of battle experience. Sazh's cheery, joking manner could cause others to misapprehend him as unserious, but in fact he had a mature outlook on life and could be counted on as a provider of wisdom. His constant companion was a chocobo chick.
strings.summon:
I'll go with you.
If you don't mind hanging out with a rookie.
strings.affinity: To this old man, you're still just a kid. So don't worry, I'll take care of you.
strings.fusion: Looks like Daddy won't be fighting alone anymore.

effects: Physical damage (2.1x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Sazh worked as a pilot of passenger ships in the floating continent of Cocoon, until his normal life was snatched away when the fal'Cie branded his son, Dajh, a l'Cie. Determined to fight for the sake of his son, he boarded a train bound for the world below, where he met Lightning. The two renegades then headed to the mysterious "Vestige" together, where they were eventually cursed as l'Cie themselves.
strings.summon: Daddy's gonna tear this place up! Well, not literally tear it...unless this place is made of paper and aluminum foil.
strings.evolution: I'm gonna be serious for a minute. If you're scared of dying and want to run away, run without looking back and you'll be OK.
strings.affinity: To this old man, you're still just a kid. So don't worry, I'll take care of you.
strings.fusion: I'll find a way to repay you for everything you've done for this old man.

effects: Physical damage (2.3x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A man who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Bent on saving his son Dajh from his fate as a l'Cie, Sazh threw himself into the heat of battle, only to be, ironically, branded as a l'Cie himself. Worse yet, the fal'Cie that had chosen him as their servant were working in opposition to the fal'Cie directing his son. Now an enemy of Cocoon, Sazh was persecuted to the point of contemplating death as an escape. However, the hope of one day seeing his son smile again freed him from despair.
strings.summon: Even when you're in trouble, you just have to laugh it off. Moping around won't help any.
strings.evolution: Some people say you have to hit rock bottom before finding hope. Look out, rock bottom: here comes a cannonball!
strings.affinity: To this old man, you're still just a kid. So don't worry, I'll take care of you.
strings.fusion:
Daddy's all fired up!
Or it could just be heartburn, but that's good enough for now.

effects: Physical damage (2.5x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A boy who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Hope lived an ordinary life with his loving parents in Cocoon, the floating continent ruled by servants of the gods; beings known as the fal'Cie. Apart from the rebellious attitude toward his father expected of a sensitive adolescent, his life was free of trouble. However, all that changed when he and his mother went on a trip to the seaside town of Bodhum and encountered the turmoil caused by the appearance of a creature from "Pulse." From that moment on, Hope's life would never return to normalcy.
strings.summon: I'll do better, and try harder, so that I won't be in your way. Please, take me with you...
strings.affinity:
We will not run away.
We will keep going and do what we have to do.
strings.fusion: The guy who destroyed my dreams will pay for it. I'm not ready yet, but I will be. Soon.

strings.description: A boy who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. While Hope was on a trip with his mother in the seaside town of Bodhum, the military found the mysterious "Vestige," prompting the immediate banishment of everyone in the area. Hope then witnessed his mother's death amidst the turmoil, and blamed the young leader of the civilian forces, Snow, for its occurrence. Swearing revenge upon Snow, Hope headed toward the Vestige, where he was eventually cursed as a "l'Cie."
strings.summon: The world is full of lies. There's no way of knowing what's right. All we can do is believe in ourselves.
strings.evolution:
If we have the power to destroy...
Then we have the power to save others. And I... I will!
strings.affinity:
We will not run away.
We will keep going and do what we have to do.
strings.fusion:
"It's not a question of can or can't. There are some things in life you just do."
Lightning taught me that. I'll fight too, just like her.

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of a world where the gods toy with humanity's fate. Although Fang was one of the dreaded l'Cie so feared by the people of Cocoon, she was somehow cooperating with their military forces. It was heard that she approached them in hopes of finding her missing childhood friend. Fang was a candid and sisterly warrior, who also enjoyed challenging formidable opponents to the death. However, she also had a tender heart; most tender of all if ever she witnessed her friends falling prey to their own fears.
strings.summon: I don't want to owe you anything. So if you're going to fight, don't do it unwillingly.
strings.affinity: Miracles are what we do best. Even if we had to take on the gods themselves, there's no way we'd lose.
strings.fusion: Huh, interesting technique you've got there. Is that what you call a miracle in this world?

Her candor and amiability allowed her to befriend the l'Cie of Cocoon, though nothing could surpass the sisterly bond she shared with Vanille. It also seemed, unfortunately, that Fang was missing some of her memories.
strings.summon:
I'm looking for someone.
Her name is Vanille.
Ring any bells?
strings.evolution: Hmph. I don't plan to lose, so I feel bad for the poor souls that try to cross us.
strings.affinity: Miracles are what we do best. Even if we had to take on the gods themselves, there's no way we'd lose.

Her tale tells that she became a l'Cie to protect her home world of Gran Pulse from an attack by the floating continent of Cocoon; however, her recollection of the incident remained sketchy. What could never be in doubt, however, was her enduring affection for her friend Vanille; a love unequaled, having spent half a lifetime with her.
strings.summon:
I'm a broken l'Cie.

strings.evolution: Let me show you how we take care of business in Gran Pulse!
strings.affinity: Miracles are what we do best. Even if we had to take on the gods themselves, there's no way we'd lose.

He is powerful despite being of royal blood, and like his forefathers is able to unleash the "Power of Kings," in which he can summon weapons to attack. Set to marry Lady Lunafreya of the imperial province of Tenebrae in accordance to the cease-fire with the Niflheim Empire, he sets off from the capital city Insomnia with his best friends, where his journey begins.
strings.summon: Stand back, I got this.
strings.affinity:
I couldn't have got this far on my own.
You've really brought me a long way...
...Thanks.

Though he often acts brash in order to hide his shy and soft-spoken nature, he inherited his father's compassion for others and is a truly kind person. He is particularly accepting of his friends, treating them as if they were part of his own family.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Ramza is a mysterious warrior who left many questions unanswered, after his untimely death, regarding his role in the War of Lions, and his actions as a heretic. Born the third and last son of the noble house of Beoulve, he strove to uphold his family name by becoming a knight alongside his childhood friend Delita, eventually joining the Gariland Royal Military Akademy with him. However, when compared to his two half brothers who were already knights, he never considered himself worthy of the house name.
strings.summon:
I may be inexperienced,
but I am a Beoulve,
and I fight for the honor of my name!
strings.affinity:
Just as you placed your trust in me,
I shall place mine in you.
I would be honored to continue fighting by your side!
strings.fusion: My father told me to follow the path I believe in. But where should I really place my faith?

Ramza is the third and last son of the noble house of Beoulve, who always felt inferior to his two more successful half brothers. A virtuous young man with little knowledge of the intrigues that hatch like snakes in times of war, Ramza remained oblivious to the dark side of the world he inhabited. He held great promise as the son of a respected house, but his life was much altered by the events that would follow the great conflict known as the War of Lions.
strings.summon: I wonder, is this world, too, blighted by strife? And could I be of any service?

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Delita served the widely respected House Beoulve, into which he and his sister Tietra had been adopted following the death of their severely ill parents. Once taken in, he became fast friends with Ramza, a son of the head of the house, Barbaneth Beoulve. It was Delita's adoptive father who would push both him and Ramza to join the exclusive Gariland Royal Military Akademy. The two friends gradually formed a bond which transcended the social gap that originally separated them.
strings.summon:
Are you knights as well?
So even another world has kings and knights, and I'm still a misfit.
strings.affinity: You wish me, a man of common birth and heir to no house, to aid you in your quest? Just like Ramza...
strings.fusion:
Have I become...a little stronger?
Yet I am barely along the path to becoming a great knight.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Delita and his sister Tietra were born mere commoners, but were adopted into the noble House Beoulve after losing their parents to the Black Death. He was raised alongside Ramza, whom he quickly befriended and eventually trained with at the Gariland Royal Military Akademy. However, after Tietra became a casualty of a bungled plot during the War of Lions, he came to a grim understanding of the ramifications of his social position.
strings.summon:
I am neither a knight,
nor a mere commoner.
I belong nowhere.
strings.evolution:
Now that I have this power,
what shall I do with it?
Ramza...please show me the way.
strings.affinity: You wish me, a man of common birth and heir to no house, to aid you in your quest? Just like Ramza...
strings.fusion:
I have always felt out of place.
But even so, I might once have hoped to make peace with my situation.

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Agrias was a knight serving the Lionsguard, the personal bodyguards of the Atkascha royal family, and was entrusted with protecting Princess Ovelia. Her loyalty to the crown was unquestionable, yet she abhorred the corruption in the powers-that-be of Ivalice; those who would exploit Ovelia for their own schemes. Agrias sought to shelter the princess from the perils of the upcoming war by relocating her to Gallionne. There, they would meet the mercenary Ramza.
strings.summon:
Where am I?
Have you summoned me here?
strings.affinity: Regardless of any predicament, trust in your comrades. My comrades put their faith in me, so shall I do the same with you!
strings.fusion:
Our lives are as fleeting as dreams.
What a somber thought.

strings.description: A woman who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. As a holy knight, each devastating swing of her sword was charged with a sense of justice and honor. Her position as a knight of the Lionsguard, which protected the royal family, led her to become Princess Ovelia's personal bodyguard. Sympathizing with the sequestered life the princess led, Agrias threw herself into the heat of battle to protect her from all harm. She would later find a kindred spirit in Ramza, with whom she braved death numerous times throughout her mission to guard the princess.
strings.summon:
Are you in need of aid?
I trust you will use this blade in the name of justice!
strings.evolution:
This new power...
Is it an awakening?
strings.affinity: Regardless of any predicament, trust in your comrades. My comrades put their faith in me, so shall I do the same with you!
strings.fusion: A knight cannot turn her back on duty and leave her work undone! Allow me to accompany you!

strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Alma is the youngest of four siblings in the honorable House Beoulve's line of succession. She attends the Eagrose Preparatory Akademy, and is a cheerful and bright girl who readily befriends people across class boundaries. Alma favored her full brother, Ramza, over their two elder half brothers, and spent most of her life in a monastery. There she met Princess Ovelia, to whom she became a close friend after realizing they shared similar circumstances.
strings.summon:
I am going with you!
I am convinced I shall prove useful somehow!
strings.affinity: You have taught me that there are things even I can do to help. Now, allow me to show my gratitude.
strings.fusion: I shall teach you how to whistle on a blade of grass. There is a small secret to it, you know!

Alma is the youngest in the honorable House Beoulve's line of succession, and is a cheerful and bright girl, adored by her closest brother, Ramza. After losing her childhood friend Tietra to the events that unfolded in the Battle of Ziekden Fortress, she began to question the motives of her two eldest brothers, and decided to join Ramza on his quest. It wasn't long before she too was caught up in the web of conspiracies crisscrossing Ivalice like tripwires.
strings.summon: I may not be as strong as my brother Ramza, but I can still aid you in battle!

a little stronger...?

After coming to doubt the motives of her elder half brothers and the war they waged, she decided to join Ramza, who severed ties with House Beoulve by absconding. Originally intending only to help Ramza locate the auracite within the Orbonne Monastery, she was unfortunately caught in the conspiracy then transpiring in Ivalice, which greatly altered her fate.
strings.summon: To live in Ivalice is a wondrous blessing. You love your world as well, do you not? If so, then you must protect it!
strings.evolution:

strings.affinity: You have taught me that there are things even I can do to help. Now, allow me to show my gratitude.

strings.description: A mercenary who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. As tensions ran high due to the outbreak of war, Gaffgarion was hired by the Order of the Northern Sky to protect Princess Ovelia en route to Eagrose. He had in fact been division commander of the Order of the Eastern Sky during the Fifty Years' War, but was expelled for the barbarism he employed to ensure his final victory. Now he serves as a superior to his comrade Ramza, who has renounced the name of his noble house.
strings.summon:
You seek my services?
I do expect you have the means to pay my fee.
strings.affinity: I never act when there is no coin in it for myself, but consider this charity! I shall accompany you a tad longer.
strings.fusion: Men do not act of their own accord without expecting recompense! You know this to be true.

Gaffgarion was a man who would use any means necessary to ensure victory, if money was at stake. Although he had been hired to protect Princess Ovelia, his true mission was revealed to be the elimination of the young girl. However, his plans to assassinate the princess failed thanks to Delita, and he was thus promptly forced to part from Ramza's company.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. He was the son of Besrudio Bunansa, a brilliant machinist famed for the creation of mechanical weaponry. Mustadio had mastered use of the pistol, a device that could fire metal projectiles at high speed when packed with explosive powder. Mustadio and his father found the Taurus auracite while at an excavation site in the clockwork city of Goug. This led them to be persecuted by the infamous Baert Trading Company until Ramza came to their rescue.
strings.summon:
My name is Mustadio.
I am a machinist who toils to restore lost legacies!
strings.affinity:
I knew it!
I was confident you and I would become good friends!
