strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Ace was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. As an Agito Cadet he trains with Class Zero at the Akademeia, and wields a deck of magically infused cards as his weapon. Although he may appear cool and collected, he can be quite rash when overcome with emotion. Ace refers to Arecia, who heads Akademeia's Sorcery Division, as "Mother."
strings.summon:
Once the seal is broken,
our voice becomes as thunder.
...We have arrived.
strings.affinity:
Of course we've butted heads at times,
but we share the same destiny.
We're like...family.
strings.fusion:
Tears beget naught.
Putting the blame on someone else will not bring back the dead.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. As a cadet in training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors, he fought alongside Class Zero to deter the Militesi invasion during the liberation campaign and protect the Vermilion Bird. Unfortunately, however, Ace's request to have his closest friend Izana on the battlefield would result in the latter's untimely death. The loss of Izana caused tensions to run high within the group, as Izana's younger brother Machina had only recently joined Class Zero.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Nine is a member of Akademeia's Class Zero, and a cadet in training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. He is brash in nature, and is as skilled with the lance as he is hot-headed. When Kurasame became Class Zero's new commanding officer, Nine's response was telling him to "take a hike." However, he seems to completely trust Class Zero's adoptive mother, Arecia.

Trey is a member of Akademeia's Class Zero, and a cadet in training to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. However, his tendency to ramble on without end often causes his classmates' patience to run short. In battle, he can take enemies down from great distances with his bow.

strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Eight is one of the members of Class Zero, who are all Agito Cadets. Calm and collected, he never allows his emotions to impair his sound judgment. At times his straightforwardness makes him appear like the oddball of Class Zero, but it is this particular quality that leaves him with the responsibility of calming other more hotheaded cadets. Eight displays his quick wit best on the battlefield when landing blow after blow to close in on his enemies, every one of his punches carrying his full might.
strings.summon:
One should always follow orders.
That way the result is always the same.
strings.evolution: We must try not to forget those who lost their lives while we still remain.
strings.affinity:
We're not done fighting just yet,
but have you given thought to the future?
strings.fusion: My fists shall at least remember the pain that you feel...

strings.description: A warrior who appears in the tales of a distant world where crystals bring peace and prosperity to the people. The identity of this small creature, whose visible pom-pom suggests a possible relationship to the moogle race, is completely shrouded in mystery. Its weapon of choice seems to be knives, and beyond being merely light on its feet, it even moves around while balancing on a ball. Never seen without a smile on its face, those who study acrobatics have yet to reach a consensus on the meaning of its enigmatic grin.
strings.summon:
We apologize for the wait!
The show is about to begin, kupo!
strings.affinity:
We've worked so hard together!
We should continue bringing smiles to everyone, kupo!
strings.fusion: Even my knife throwing is improving, kupo!

strings.description: A mysterious warrior who appears in the tales of a distant world where crystals bring peace and prosperity to the people. It is unknown how the Juggler—or is it Jugglers?—became two creatures following its awakening. However, its juggling skills atop a balancing ball, not to mention its hooping abilities, became markedly stronger. The two creatures are completely synchronized, allowing them to fight foes in perfect unison. Although its acrobatic feats and sweet smile make it seem adorable, there is something unsettling about the fact that it never displays any other emotions.
strings.summon:

strings.description: A warrior who appears in the tales of a distant world where crystals bring peace and prosperity to the people. Sensing a wicked presence nearby, the moogles called upon all their friends to ask for the protection of their precious crystals. The Thief, with his incredible agility in battle, and specializing in the collection of any gil scattered throughout the field, was one of them. The Thief is an indispensable ally when money is required to keep troops in top shape.

strings.fusion:

strings.description: A prominent goddess in lore from another world where humans and gods share a history. Tilith pledged her service to Lucius, the god of the Gate, and took a certain summoner from the fantastical world of Grand Gaia under her wing. She may seem like a normal girl at first glance, but her divinity is apparent through the multiple miracles she has performed to save her summoner in moments of crisis. Ever a cheerful soul, even those who might normally poke fun at an innocent nature like hers cannot help but smile in her presence.

strings.affinity:

I'm so happy, I'm gonna work even harder from now on!
strings.fusion:
Yeah, I feel good!
And as thanks for making me stronger,
I'll help you out!

strings.description: A prominent summoner in lore from another world where humans and gods share a history. Karl is a member of the Akras Summoners' Hall, and the commander of the 24th Demon Slayers Division. Not only is he known as the "Rebel Lance," he was also granted the prestigious title of "Nyonne." Karl's talent and skill were recognized when he defeated the demon Zagamlung, a feat that propelled him to the highest ranks of the Summoners' Hall. However, he is not the kind to boast; always treating those around him with kindness. The trust he places in his childhood friend, a summoner like himself, is unbreakable.

strings.description: A prominent summoner in lore from another world where humans and gods share a history. Seria is a member of the Akras Summoners' Hall, and commands her own Demon Slayers' squadron. Though some may regard her aggressive nature as unfeminine, her skills as a warrior have earned her the nickname "Goddess of the Arena," a womanly title that none would dare deny. The incredible power contained in her petite frame allows her to wield her sword with an incomparable fusion of ferocity and grace. In fact, Seria's only serious flaw may be her tendency to criticize others, harshly and at the drop of a tiara. Rumor has it that her use of the word "idiot" is legendary in her home world of Grand Gaia.

strings.description: A prominent summoner in lore from another world where humans and gods share a history. Seria is a member of the Akras Summoners' Hall, and boasts powers far beyond those of the average summoner. Unfortunately, however, she tends to be rude to others and has trouble following orders. Indeed, it would be fair to say that she goes out of her way to distance herself from others as much as possible. This is most likely due to a certain incident in her past; an incident that may also have stunted her growth while she was still very young. Were she able to finally overcome this lingering trauma, her powers might grow to incredible new peaks.

strings.description: One of the Fallen Gods from another world where humans and gods share a history. According to legend, the Fallen Gods were divine beings who terrorized the world of Grand Gaia with their incredible power. Tasked with the burden of resurrection, Maxwell ruled over St. Lamia in hopes of ultimately destroying the sealed land of Grand Gaia in order to rebuild it anew as its creator and mistress. As a Fallen God she had always been a high ranking goddess, but never as powerful as the Holy Emperor Karna Masta, leader of the gods. Once she came to embrace the wickedness in her heart, she rebelled against him and began acting upon her own volition.

strings.description: A knight from the icy highlands, who was known for his generosity and nobility. His parents were residents of two neighbouring countries that shared a long history of war. From his father, Noel learnt how to pilot a robot whilst his mother trained him in the arts of magic. During a short period of time when the two countries were at peace, Noel was able to travel freely between them, helping the poor he met along the way by providing them with gifts.
strings.summon:
I am Noel, the White Knight.
Saving the world, you say?
Count me in.
strings.affinity:
Battling for a good cause
and helping the weak...
It's been an honor travelling with you!
strings.fusion:
True strength is shown not by flaunting it
but by using it to protect the defenseless
from evil.

effects: Increase DEF and MAG by 40% for 3 turn(s) to all allies.

strings.description: A knight known for his generosity and nobility. Always seen riding atop a gold and white robot, he is known by people as the "White Knight." When war broke out between two neighbouring countries, the homelands of his parents, Noel gave up his life to defend the powerless from the soldiers. Tales of his brave sacrifice quickly spread, eventually leading to the end of the war. After his death, residents of the two nations celebrate the Festival of the White Knight annually to remember him and to remind themselves of the importance of peace.
strings.summon:
An army standing up for the weak...
Great! Let me join your cause!
strings.evolution:
This is what it feels like to be awakened...
I will use my new found strength to aid you!
strings.affinity:
Battling for a good cause
and helping the weak...
It's been an honor travelling with you!
strings.fusion:
My powers have grown.
Now, I can better serve the needs
of those without the means.

strings.description: A white magic expert born into the community of researchers that would one day become Mysidia. Roselia immersed herself in magical research simply because she was good at it. However, when a plague struck and she was unable to cure her fellow researchers, she became profoundly aware of her limitations.
strings.summon:
Are you the one who summoned me?
You need my healing magic?
I shall do as you ask.
strings.affinity:
Let us take a break for today.
And it's not much,
but I got this for you.
strings.fusion:
Hmmm. My magic powers grow...
It seems that visions do not require training to gain strength...

strings.description: A white mage from the land that would come to be known as Mysidia. Due to her father's influence, she never developed a healer's compassion and was interested only in research for its own sake. Only as she succumbed to the plague ravaging her homeland did she begin to regret her unfeeling approach to white magic, so she carries that regret beyond death, as a vision.
strings.summon:
I was only a researcher of magic.
But now, I am your ally.
Show me your wounded, and I will heal them.
strings.evolution:

Stronger down to the core.

strings.affinity:

strings.fusion: If I had been this powerful while I was alive, I could have saved so many...

strings.description: A silent warrior atop a chocobo who donned a curious piece of armor. Yun lost his parents during infancy after monsters viciously attacked his village, leaving nothing but death in their wake save for a single chocobo. Yun befriended the feathery creature, and they eventually left together on a journey around the world. The experience he gained through their rigorous journey helped him to develop unique battle abilities which he vowed to use to destroy the monsters that took the lives of those dearest to him. He is said to have continued his crusade against monsters until an illness claimed his life.
strings.summon:
There are still so many monsters...
As long as you don't mind my friend joining,
my fists are yours to borrow.
strings.affinity:
We are both grateful to you.
You were the one that finally taught me
these fists are not for revenge.
strings.fusion:
To be honest, I'm surprised.
I didn't think such a way of growing stronger existed.

strings.description: A warrior who set off on a journey to vanquish monsters alongside his trusty chocobo. Yun swore to take revenge upon the monsters that killed his family when he was a child, and in the process saved many people who came to admire him deeply. Unfortunately, his long journey and continuous battles against monsters caused him to contract an illness that eventually took his life. His faithful chocobo is said to have stayed by his side until the very end.
strings.summon:
There are still so many monsters...
As long as you don't mind my friend joining,
my fists are yours to borrow.

strings.description: A graceful dancer with fascinating moves that is rumored to have put men, as well as beasts, under a trance. Ling's origins are completely shrouded in mystery, but some believe that her grief-stricken expression and ability to express genuine suffering through her performances may provide a clue about her true identity. While many speculate that she may have been the princess of a ruined country, others believe her to have been an assassin who traveled the world targeting royalty. Some even claim she was the incarnation of a white dragon that was chased away from its home.
strings.summon:
You need my dancing?
I see... Well then, I will go with you.
strings.affinity:
The feelings travelling with you have
afforded me have beautified my dancing.
I look forward to our future together.
strings.fusion:
I need to become stronger
if I'm to keep living life on my own...

strings.description: A wandering dancer who inspired both fascination and grief through her craft. Although the story behind Ling's origins differs from person to person, she was actually born in a village. Having lost her parents before she could even remember, she lived in solitude for many years until she met a wandering dancer. Taking the dancer as her master, she learned the skills and abilities required in order to become a dancer herself. Ling quickly rose in popularity following her training as she performed from bar to bar, but unfortunately tragedy would soon strike anew.
strings.summon:
You need my dancing?
I see... Well then, I will go with you.
strings.evolution:

strings.affinity:

afforded me have beautified my dancing.
I look forward to our future together.
strings.fusion:

strings.description: A dancer who entranced humans and beasts alike. Tragedy struck for Ling when her master was killed before her eyes by a bandit as she toured the countryside for her performances. Luckily she managed to use her dancing skills to flee from any further danger, and met a monk on the road whom she hired as her bodyguard. Feeling safe in his care, she eventually developed feelings for the monk. However, he had his own goals and dreams to realize, and thus left her to accomplish them, never to return. Consumed by her own grief, she ultimately perished during her travels. Her heartbreaking story has survived to this day through the songs many have written about her.
strings.summon:

strings.fusion:

strings.description: A young boy who fought with a legendary holy sword in a world protected by the great power of mana. Though he was brought to Potos Village when he was very young by his mother, he soon found himself completely alone and without any family, at which time the village head took him in. However, seen as an outsider, he was picked on by the local bullies, and unfortunately grew up to be a very timid and cowardly little boy. Then one day, having pulled out the legendary holy sword, Randi set off to save the world in which the balance of mana had begun to crumble.
strings.summon:
The is the sacred sword of legend....
What am I to do with it?
strings.affinity:
Quite a lot has happened,
but at least we were together.
That's how I made it this far.
strings.fusion:
Awesome!
I've powered up!
...right?

effects: Physical damage (2.7x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young boy who fought with a legendary holy sword in a world protected by the great power of mana. Having suddenly been ousted from his village after freeing the holy sword, Randi comes across a travelling swordsman named Jema and follows him on a journey to take back the power of his sword. He then ventures around the world with Primm, the daughter of the cabinet minister of the kingdom of Pandora, and Popoi, a sprite looking to find his way home. In doing so, Randi learns of his birth and ultimately of his purpose, awakening his true courage as he goes.
strings.summon:
I'm Randi!
I'm looking for the Tree of Mana...
strings.evolution:
I will grow stronger!
Along with this holy sword!
strings.affinity:
Quite a lot has happened,
but at least we were together.
That's how I made it this far.
strings.fusion:
The power of the holy sword is returning...
I need to power up, as well!

effects: Physical damage (2.9x ATK) to one enemy.

strings.description: A young girl who fought to save the man she loved in a world protected by the great power of mana. The daughter of the cabinet minister of the kingdom of Pandora, outside of losing her mother at a young age, she was able to live a fairly carefree life, making her self-empowered and selfish. Having heard the knight Dyluck whom she loved had gone to fight an evil witch, she headed after him and left the kingdom. On her journey she was to come across a young boy about to be eaten by a great monster, which was to greatly impact her destiny.
strings.summon:
I am Primm.
I look forward to working with you!
strings.affinity:
To have been able to come this far...
I'm so glad I was able to meet you!
strings.fusion:
That's great!
We'll certainly find what we're looking for at this rate!

strings.description: A young sprite searching for his home in a world protected by the great power of mana.  Despite being a bit cheeky and calculating, he has a very positive personality. Swept away in the flood that hit the forest of sprites, he was taken in by the village head at Gaia's Navel, however due to the shock of the flood he couldn't remember his own name or where he came from. He began to trick and steal from travelers in order to raise funds for his journey home, however, that was until he came across Randi, the boy with the legendary holy sword.

Daña y reduce la res. a oscuridad y rayo de todos los enemigos

strings.description: A beautiful singer from a distant world, whose goal is to bring love and grow peace in the realm. A natural born singer who started performing ever since she was a child. The combination of her incredible vocal range and her passion for music made her a force to be reckoned with!
strings.summon: Tell me what you came here for?
strings.evolution: Been waiting and waiting for you to make a move.
strings.affinity:
Music drives my whole life.
Let's make some good music together!
strings.fusion: Let's plant love and grow peace!

effects: Magical damage (2.4x MAG) to all enemies.
Reduce resistance to Lightning and Dark by 20% for 3 turns to all enemies.

name: Touch It
Touch It
Touch It
Touch It
Touch It
Touch It
desc: Damage and reduce dark and lightning resistance for all enemies

적 전체에 피해+번개와 어둠속성 저항력 감소

strings.description: A beautiful singer from a distant world, whose goal is to bring love and grow peace in the realm. Raised with a flair for music, she started performing from a young age. Incited by her desire to create and share wonderful music with the world, she worked hard to become a successful singer.
strings.summon: Love is one of the most beautiful things in life.
strings.evolution: That's it! Put your heart into it!
strings.affinity:
Music drives my whole life.
Let's make some good music together!
strings.fusion: Focus! Then take me all the way…

effects: Magical damage (2.7x MAG) to all enemies.
Reduce resistance to Lightning and Dark by 25% for 3 turns to all enemies.

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt, he and his friend Lasswell are considered two of the most formidable knights to grace the Royal Guard since Rain's father Sir Raegen. Though he harbors conflicted feelings toward his father for having abandoned him and his family, he keeps this to himself when in the presence of Lasswell, who still deeply respects the man.
strings.summon: The fire in me burns once again. I am ready to fight alongside you!
strings.affinity: The battles we have fought together… thanks for your trust in my powers. Take this as a token of my gratitude.
strings.fusion: Feels like I can take on more enemies!

effects: Fire physical damage (2.4x ATK) to all enemies.

name: Shining Nova
閃光新星
샛별의 광휘
Nova étincelante
Novaglanz
Nova deslumbrante
desc: 對全體敵人發動火屬性攻擊
Dégâts de feu sur tous les ennemis
Daño de fuego a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt. Though usually preoccupied chasing girls, on his journey chasing after the Sworn Six of Paladia who attacked his homeland a gentler, more courageous side of him came through. At a young age he came in contact with the earth crystal, but little did he know that would become the catalyst that sealed his fate.
strings.summon: Alive and burning... it feels so good. When does the next battle start?
strings.evolution: I can feel raw power coursing through my veins!
strings.affinity: The battles we have fought together… thanks for your trust in my powers. Take this as a token of my gratitude.
strings.fusion: My strength grows…time to smash some foes!

effects: Fire physical damage (2.7x ATK) to all enemies.

name: Shining Nova

샛별의 광휘
Nova étincelante
Novaglanz
Nova deslumbrante
desc: 對全體敵人發動火屬性攻擊
Dégâts de feu sur tous les ennemis
Daño de fuego a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt whose talents earned him command of an airship alongside Rain. Lasswell is a tireless worker, entirely devoted to his duties and training. He holds the utmost respect for Rain's father, Sir Raegen, once a prominent knight of Grandshelt himself. Lasswell lends his strength to Rain as a way to honor the memory of his hero, while struggling with the fact that this prestigious lineage is not his own.
strings.summon: You who summoned me, can I trust you? I suppose I could…
strings.affinity: You have been a great mentor in our journeys together. Umm…thanks.
strings.fusion: Grace and agility…this costume of mine is awesome.

effects: Ice physical damage (2.4x ATK) to all enemies.

name: Azure Sky
雲外蒼天
운외창천
Ciel sans nuage
Wolkenbeben
Cielo azul
desc: 對全體敵人發動冰屬性攻擊
Dégâts de glace sur tous les ennemis
Daño de frío a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt who was raised alongside Rain by Rain's father, Sir Raegen, who also trained Lasswell in various skills. Out of respect for everything he had been given, he has a tendancy to worry about Rain and his wellbeing, though he seems to be hiding some dreams and hopes of his own. His beloved sword, purple lightning, is the last remaining connection he has to Sir Raegen.
strings.summon:
What is this new form I have taken?
You look like someone I can trust…
strings.evolution: My powers have reached a new level. This is interesting…
strings.affinity: You have been a great mentor in our journeys together. Umm…thanks.
strings.fusion:
My powers have grown vastly.
If only I could've attained this power earlier.

effects: Ice physical damage (2.7x ATK) to all enemies.

name: Azure Sky
雲外蒼天
운외창천
Ciel sans nuage
Wolkenbeben
Cielo azul
desc: 對全體敵人發動冰屬性攻擊
Dégâts de glace sur tous les ennemis
Daño de frío a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal. Because she has amnesia, she relies on impulse to guide her actions, which can often cause trouble for her comrades. Having woken in a strange world without her memories, she struggles with confusion and anxiety, but displays great inner strength in joining Rain and Lasswell on their quest.
strings.summon: White Witch at your service… Uh, what was I saying?
strings.affinity: Thank you for allowing me to help you in your fights. I'm so happy that you trust me.
strings.fusion: I think I am stronger now...and can be of more help to you.

effects: Light magical damage (2.2x MAG) to all enemies.

name: Innocent Glow
純白聖潔
순수한 빛무리
Lueur d'innocence
Unschuldsglanz
Brillo inocente
desc: 對全體敵人發動光屬性攻擊
Dégâts de lumière sur tous les ennemis
Daño de luz a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal, whose mysterious identity seems to tie her to the origins of the world. Pure of heart, Fina possesses an innocent nature and an insatiable curiosity about her surroundings. Her childlike behavior, in part the product of memory loss, may also stem from her original, lost personality.
strings.summon:
What's this new power?
Now I can continue to use my white magic to help others.
strings.evolution: It's like my latent powers have been unlocked… I feel stronger.
strings.affinity: Thank you for allowing me to help you in your fights. I'm so happy that you trust me.
strings.fusion: My control over spirits has grown…now I can better use it to aid you.

effects: Light magical damage (2.4x MAG) to all enemies.

name: Heaven's Judgment
天堂審判
하늘의 심판
Jugement divin
Jüngstes Gericht
Juicio divino
desc: 對全體敵人發動光屬性攻擊
Dégâts de lumière sur tous les ennemis
Daño de luz a todos los enemigos

strings.description: A young girl who emerged from an earth crystal, whose mysterious identity seems to tie her to the origins of the world. Pure of heart, Fina possesses an innocent nature and an insatiable curiosity about her surroundings. Despite her childlike behavior, she has grown to become a powerful ally to her partners, Rain and Lasswell.
strings.summon:
To be able to walk with spirits again.
Thank you for calling on me.
strings.evolution: My mind is so clear and focused, it feels incredible to be awakened.
strings.affinity: Thank you for allowing me to help you in your fights. I'm so happy that you trust me.
strings.fusion: Really? To think that I am now capable of protecting everyone, it's like a dream come true.

effects: Light magical damage (2.7x MAG) to all enemies.

name: Heaven's Judgment
天堂審判
하늘의 심판
Jugement divin
Jüngstes Gericht
Juicio divino
desc: 對全體敵人發動光屬性攻擊
Dégâts de lumière sur tous les ennemis
Daño de luz a todos los enemigos

strings.description: An airship engineer from Dirnado, who grew from a kid toying with machines in her parents' workshop to the finest engineer in the Industrial City. Lid is determined to inherit the name Cid, an honor granted only to the greatest in her trade. Her only serious flaw seems to be her love of money.
strings.summon: Meow! How much gil do you have?
strings.affinity: Here's a taste of my new found powers!
strings.fusion: What's this? I feel like I'm getting stronger!

effects: Physical damage (2x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: An airship engineer from Dirnado. Lid had an interest in machinery from childhood, but it wasn't until her older brother began showing her the ropes (and gears) that her aptitude blossomed into real talent. Her most treasured possession is her robot chocobo named Mechabo, which she and her brother built together. She became even more attached to Mechabo when her brother left home.
strings.summon: Trick-or-treat! Meow!
strings.evolution: I'm a cat, a magical cat! Meow!
strings.affinity: Here's a taste of my new found powers!
strings.fusion: There's so much more gil to make! Meow!

effects: Physical damage (2.2x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: An airship engineer who is paving the way to a new era. Unfortunately for Lid, her older brother was the one to inherit the Cid name she so coveted, after he left home. Regardless, she single-handedly renovated the desolate workshop her brother had abandoned, using the first Cid and his philosophy of freedom as her inspiration. Lid now seeks to become the embodiment of her hero as she travels with Rain.
strings.summon: M-me-meow! I'm ready for the party, are you?
strings.evolution: Hey, time to get more candies! Me-yow!
strings.affinity: Here's a taste of my new found powers!
strings.fusion: Yay! More candies! The fun has only just begun!

effects: Physical damage (2.4x ATK) to all enemies.

strings.description: A monster inside a green pot. It takes great joy in training its body, and is always carrying around dumbbells. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Among these, it is said that tough pots have a particular fondness for HP, the knowledge relating to which, this pot stores in its pot.
strings.summon:
Must become...more...
powerful...

strings.description: A grown-up mini tough pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to HP within their pot. They also carry around dumbbells wherever they go, never missing a training session.  It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. It is unknown whether this is true, but what is known is that they are able to bestow their knowledge to others.
strings.summon:
Have you all been training...?
Strong humans... I love them!

strings.description: A form of pot which all tough pots strive to become.  It carries around massive dumbbells, training harder than it ever has. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. What is known is that they are so rare one would have to be very lucky just to see one, and that they hold a massive amount of knowledge regarding HP in their large pots.
strings.summon:
Do you require my power?
Then allow me to see how full of vitality you all are.

strings.description: A monster inside a yellow pot. It's always carrying around a magic tome, constant thinking about everything concerning MP.  Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Magi pots are obsessed with anything and everything relating to MP, information relating to which they keep in their pots.
strings.summon:
I sense MP...
I will stick with you!

strings.description: A grown-up mini magi pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to MP within their pot. It carries around a large magic tome so as not to miss out on its MP studies. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. They love watching humans use MP, often following around and befriending those who do so.
strings.summon:
If I were to become one with you,
I wonder if you could understand MP?

strings.description: A form of pot which all magi pots strive to become. It carries around a thick magic tome as it is constantly thinking about MP. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. They are incredibly curious about MP, and once they find a human using magic or other skills, they can't help but run towards them to get a closer look.
strings.summon: Show me more how you wield MP!

strings.description: A monster inside a red pot. Nothing makes it happier than sharpening its attack power, and it always carries around a blade. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Power pots are obsessed with anything and everything relating to ATK, information relating to which they keep in their pots.
strings.summon:
I can fight, too!
Slash! Chop! Hack!

strings.description: A grown-up mini power pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to ATK within their pot. They carry around a great sword, never missing a chance to train themselves. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. It loves preparing for battle, and when it sees a potential powerful ally, it often follows them into battle.
strings.summon:
I won't lose again!
Ready your weapons,
it's time for battle!

strings.description: A form of pot which all power pots strive to become. It carries a great, splendid sword around, training with it night and day. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. It loves a good fair fight, and greatly enjoys taking out its enemies with physical attacks. Even after becoming its ally, it still insists on challenging its partners to duels.
strings.summon:
Strength is everything.
You all think so too, correct?

strings.description: A monster inside a blue pot. Nothing makes it happier than sharpening its defensive power, and it always carries around a shield. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Shield pots are obsessed with anything and everything relating to DEF, information relating to which they keep in their pots.
strings.summon:
I will strengthen
your power to protect!

strings.description: A grown-up mini shield pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to DEF within their pot. It carries around a big shield which it wields flawlessly in defending itself. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. It has a strange disposition, taking enjoyment out of using its shield to defend itself from violent attacks.
strings.summon:
Come on, attack me more...
You'll never break my guard!

strings.description: A form of pot which all shield pots strive to become. I carries around a large shield, which offers it an exceedingly firm line of defense. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. It takes great enjoyment in defending itself from heavy attacks, and regardless how violent the battle, it never hides or flees. There are many who are attracted to this tenacious creature.
strings.summon:
Go ahead, come at me.
I can withstand any attack you unleash.

strings.description: A monster inside a purple pot. Nothing makes it happier than sharpening its magic power, and it always carries around a magic cane. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Smart pots are obsessed with anything and everything relating to MAG, information relating to which they keep in their pots.
strings.summon:
You need my power?
You have quite the eye, don't you?

strings.description: A grown-up mini smart pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to MAG within their pot. It carries around a wonderful cane, and is obsessed with increasing its own MAG. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. Though incredibly wise, looking down on the ignorant, it is very timid, and will hide in its pot if scared.
strings.summon: There is none more intellegent than me. I feel sorry for my foolish enemies.

strings.description: A form of pot which all smart pots strive to become. It carries with it a splendid cane, and boasts some of the highest MAG around. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. It likes talking more than any of the other kinds of pots, but can quickly become boring as it usually only talks about itself. However, it doesn't seem to care what is said in return as simply nodding and listening don't seem to bother it.
strings.summon:
You wish to hear what I have to say?
What admirable dedication.
First off, we must speak of magic...

strings.description: A monster inside a silver pot. Nothing makes it happier than sharpening its spirit power, and is always meditating. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Soul pots are obsessed with anything and everything relating to SPR, information relating to which they keep in their pots.
strings.summon:
This world...
How did it come into existance...?

strings.description: A grown-up mini soul pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to SPR within their pot. It is in a constant state of peaceful meditation in order to properly preserve its spirit power. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. They often just sit around thinking, and are hardly ever heard speaking. Even when they are, it is usually to themselves.
strings.summon:
Visions...
...How curious.

strings.description: A form of pot which all soul pots strive to become. It is constantly sharpening its spirit energy, undisturbed by anything that happens around it. Some say they were created by the gods to wander the world gathering information on various powers, but the truth isn't well understood. It has no interest in others, and is unmoving regardless of what happens, thanks to its strong spiritual power. Even if it is suddenly introduced to a new environment, it is able to instantly adapt.
strings.summon:
The hearts of people...
...of monsters...
...of the world...

strings.description: A turtle of sparkling gold. It is known to provide good luck, and was even used as a form of currency for a time. Due to its beauty and rarity, it still fetches as fine a price at stores as any gem or ingot. In wealthy circles, it is not uncommon to hear tiresome vulgarians bragging about how many Mini Gil Snappers they keep, as a way of flaunting their affluence. Rumors even tell of a competition, held somewhere in the world, to find the most beautiful specimens.
strings.summon: I go with humans...humans feed me, yes?

strings.description: A turtle with a body of sparkling gold, which is valued as highly as any gemstone. It is a popular talisman for two distinct reasons. Firstly, because of the beauty of its golden body; and secondly, because of its great longevity. It is known that Gil Snappers live longer than men, and grow slowly but steadily over time. This is why many who hope to live long and grow ever more prosperous consider coming into possession of one an absolute boon.
strings.summon:
Gsssssshhh!
You just keep me around until I die?

strings.description: A turtle with a shell encrusted with beautiful, sparkling stones. Amongst Gil Snappers, which are known for their longevity, only those that live the longest ever achieve this magnificent form. The stones on its back can be sold to be used as gemstones, which have great popularity. Since the stones grow ever larger the longer a turtle lives, people work themselves into a frenzy searching for the largest King Gil Snapper they can find. The gemstones from their shells are commonly known as Gil Snapper Sapphires.
strings.summon:
Greedy humans!
You just want me for my shell, yes!?

strings.description: A rare, sparkling silver miniature cactuar. Despite the mellow, unassuming expression it wears, its prickly body is a treasure trove of knowledge and experience. Aware of this, hunters are constantly in search of them. However, they rarely appear in front of humans and the location of their habitat is unknown.
strings.summon:
Human...
Human...
Scary...

strings.description: A very rare, sparkling silver miniature cactuar. Eager to harvest the abundance of knowledge and experience stored in metal cactuars, those who encounter them grow frantic with greed. However, like others of its kind, the metal cactuar almost never appears in front of humans.
strings.summon:
Human...
You...want...power?

strings.description: An extremely rare, shimmering silver cactuar with a handsome mustache. Metal cactuars absorb energy from their surroundings, growing larger the more energy they absorb. Jumbo ones hold a tremendous amount of experience, and are so big that it is a wonder they are almost never seen.
strings.summon:
Ho ho!
You...need...my...help?

strings.description: A moogle holding a large crystal. The crystal is filled with a mysterious power that brings people together. It is said to appear to those who call out for the power of trust, however it rarely ever appears. Though there are some who say they're connected to the moogles that reside in the Farplane, since no one ever sees them they can't be researched any further.
strings.summon:
Kupo? Did someone call me, kupo?
I can help you, kupo!

strings.description: A moogle holding a shiny crystal. The crystal is filled with a mysterious power that brings people together. It is said to appear to those who call out for the power of trust, however it rarely ever appears. It seems that there's a pecking order even among Trust Moogles, with some saying, "The moogle with the best looking crystal is the smartest, kupo!" However, outsiders would be hard-pressed to tell the difference.
strings.summon:
Please use my power, kupo!
Something great will surely happen, kupo!

strings.description: A moogle that carries a dazzling crystal. The crystal itself is said to be composed of the mystical forces that connect the hearts of people. Trust Moogles are so rare that they may turn heads even within the moogle community itself, so to encounter one is considered quite auspicious. Trust Moogles do not search for these special crystals as a hobby, nor even as part of their training, but as the foremost task of their very purpose in life: to strengthen the bonds between people. Thus, should they encounter someone worthy of receiving a crystal, they will hand it over freely and without qualm.
strings.summon:
Sorry for the wait, kupo!
Let me help you out.
I can come in pretty handy, kupo!

strings.description: An odd wee beastie who lives in a pot. Mini Burst Pots are attracted to individuals seeking to overcome their own limits, and who possess immeasurable hidden potential. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Rumor tells that stored within their pots is the means of unlocking a warrior's dormant abilities.
strings.summon:
Just how strong...can you become?
I am...very curious.

strings.description: A grown-up mini burst pot. These enlarged pots are full of knowledge relating to a power said to "break limits." It is thought that pots original gathered up various powers from around the world to present to the gods. However, recently researchers believe that they may just be power transfer mechanisms, made to carry such power to be used by certain people.
strings.summon:
I want to see up close
what you are capable of.

strings.description: A form of pot which all burst pots strive to become. This massive pot is full of knowledge relating to a power said to "break limits." It is said that burst pots appear to those whom they deem worthy of their power. Neither age, gender, nor personality seem to play a part in whom they select, but it is said that those selected share a strong desire to break beyond their own limits.
strings.summon:
Let me see you surpass your limits
and expand your power.
